column3: Warren plans to take a 'hard look' at running for president
column4: ﻿Warren planira „dobro razmisliti” o kandidaturi na predsjedničkim izborima

column3: U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren says she'll take a "hard look at running for president" after the November elections.
column4: Američka senatorica Elizabeth Warren rekla je da će „dobro razmisliti o kandidaturi na predsjedničkim izborima” nakon izbora u studenom.

column3: The Boston Globe reports the Massachusetts Democrat spoke about her future during a town hall in western Massachusetts Saturday.
column4: Novine Boston Globe izvijestile su da je demokratkinja iz Massachusettsa govorila o svojim planovima za budućnost u obraćanju javnosti u zapadnom Massachusettsu ove subote.

column3: Warren, a frequent critic of President Donald Trump, is running for re-election in November against GOP state Rep. Geoff Diehl, who was co-chairman of Trump's 2016 Massachusetts campaign.
column4: Warren, koja često kritizira predsjednika Donalda Trumpa, kandidirala se za reizbor u studenom, a protukandidat joj je republikanski zastupnik države Geoff Diehl, koji je bio supredsjedatelj Trumpove kampanje u Massachusettsu 2016. godine.

column3: She has been at the center of speculation that she might take on Trump in 2020.
column4: Nagađa se da bi se mogla suočiti s Trumpom na izborima 2020. godine.

column3: Saturday afternoon's event in Holyoke was her 36th meeting with constituents using the town hall format since Trump took office.
column4: Događaj koji je održan ove subote popodne u Holyokeu bio je njezin 36. sastanak s biračima u obliku obraćanja javnosti otkako je Trump preuzeo dužnost predsjednika.

column3: An attendee asked her if she planned to run for president.
column4: Jedan ju je sudionik pitao planira li se kandidirati za predsjednicu.

column3: Warren replied that it's time "for women to go to Washington to fix our broken government, and that includes a woman at the top."
column4: Warren je odgovorila da je vrijeme „da žene dođu u Washington popraviti našu pokvarenu vladu, a to uključuje i žene na vrhu.”

column3: Mexico's AMLO vows not to use military against civilians
column4: ﻿Novoizabrani meksički predsjednik zavjetovao se da neće koristiti vojsku protiv civila

column3: Mexican President-elect Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador has vowed to never use military force against civilians as the country approaches the 50th anniversary of a bloody reprisal against students.
column4: Dok se država približava 50. obljetnici krvave odmazde nad studentima novoizabrani meksički predsjednik Andrés Manuel López Obrador zavjetovao se da nikad neće koristiti vojnu silu protiv civila.

column3: Lopez Obrador promised Saturday at Tlatelolco Plaza to "never ever use the military to repress the Mexican people."
column4: López Obrador obećao je u subotu na trgu u četvrti Tlatelolco da „nikad neće koristiti vojsku za prisilu nad meksičkim narodom”.

column3: Troops fired on a peaceful demonstration at the plaza on Oct. 2, 1968, killing as many as 300 people at a time when leftist student movements were taking root throughout Latin America.
column4: Vojska je 2. listopada 1968., u vrijeme kad su širom Latinske Amerike jačali ljevičarski studentski pokreti, otvorila vatru na mirne demonstracije na trgu, pri čemu je ubijeno više od 300 ljudi.

column3: Lopez Obrador has pledged to support young Mexicans by giving monthly subsidies to those who study and opening more free public universities.
column4: López Obrador obećao je pružiti potporu mladima u Meksiku mjesečnim subvencijama za studente i otvaranjem novih besplatnih javnih sveučilišta.

column3: He has said that unemployment and a lack of educational opportunities draws youth to criminal gangs.
column4: Rekao je da nezaposlenost i manjak mogućnosti za obrazovanje usmjeravaju mlade kriminalnim skupinama.

column3: Volcano spews ash on Mexico City
column4: ﻿Vulkan izbacuje pepeo po Mexico Cityju

column3: Ash spewing from the Popocatepetl volcano has reached the southern neighborhoods of Mexico's capital.
column4: Pepeo iz vulkana Popocatepetl stigao je do južnih četvrti glavnoga grada Meksika.

column3: The National Center for Disaster Prevention warned Mexicans on Saturday to stay away from the volcano after activity picked up in the crater and it registered 183 emissions of gas and ash over 24 hours.
column4: Nacionalni centar za prevenciju katastrofa u subotu je upozorio Meksikance da se drže podalje od vulkana nakon što je u krateru došlo do aktivnosti i nakon što su tijekom 24 sata zabilježene 183 emisije plina i pepela.

column3: The center was monitoring multiple rumblings and tremors.
column4: Centar je nadzirao više pojava tutnjave i podrhtavanja tla.

column3: Images on social media showed thin layers of ash coating car windshields in neighborhoods of Mexico City such as Xochimilco.
column4: Na slikama na društvenim mrežama prikazuju se automobili s tankim slojem pepela na vjetrobranima u četvrtima Mexico Cityja kao što je Xochimilco.

column3: Geophysicists have noticed an increase in activity at the volcano that sits 45 miles (72 kilometers) southeast of the capital since a 7.1-magnitude earthquake rocked central Mexico in September 2017.
column4: Otkad je potres jačine 7,1 stupnja pogodio središnji Meksiko u rujnu 2017. godine, geofizičari primjećuju povećanje aktivnosti vulkana koji se nalazi 72 kilometra (45 milja) jugoistočno od glavnoga grada.

column3: The volcano known as "Don Goyo" has been active since 1994.
column4: Vulkan poznat kao „Don Goyo” aktivan je od 1994. godine.

column3: Analyst lays out timeline of night woman was burned alive
column4: ﻿Analitičar opisao slijed događaja u noći tijekom koje je žena živa spaljena

column3: The prosecution rested its case Saturday in the retrial of a man who is accused of burning a Mississippi woman alive in 2014.
column4: Tužiteljstvo je u subotu završilo s izlaganjem predmeta u ponovnom suđenju muškarcu optuženom da je 2014. živu spalio ženu iz Mississippija.

column3: U.S. Department of Justice Analyst Paul Rowlett testified for hours as an expert witness in the field of intelligence analysis.
column4: Analitičar američkog Ministarstva pravosuđa Paul Rowlett satima je svjedočio kao sudski vještak u području analize obavještajnih podataka.

column3: He outlined for the jury how he used cellphone records to piece together the movements of 29-year-old defendant Quinton Tellis and the 19-year-old victim, Jessica Chambers, on the night she died.
column4: Poroti je opisao kako je upotrijebio telefonske podatke kako bi utvrdio kretanje 29-godišnjeg tuženika Quintona Tellisa i 19-godišnje žrtve Jessice Chambers tijekom noći u kojoj je preminula.

column3: Rowlett said he received location data from several cellphones that showed Tellis was with Chambers the evening of her death, contradicting his previous claims, The Clarion Ledger reported .
column4: Rowlett je rekao da je s više mobilnih telefona dobio podatke o lokaciji prema kojima je Tellis tu večer bio s Jessicom Chambers, što je proturječno njegovim prethodnim tvrdnjama, izvijestile su lokalne dnevne novine The Clarion Ledger.

column3: When data showed his cellphone was with Chambers' during the time he said he was with his friend Michael Sanford, police went to talk to Sanford.
column4: Kada su podaci pokazali da je njegov mobilni telefon bio na istom mjestu kao i Jessicin u vrijeme za koje je rekao da je proveo s prijateljem Michaelom Sanfordom, policija je razgovarala sa Sanfordom.

column3: Sanford took the stand Saturday and testified that he wasn't in town that day.
column4: Sanford je svjedočio u subotu i potvrdio da taj dan nije bio u gradu.

column3: When prosecutors asked if Tellis was telling the truth when he said he was in Sanford's truck that night, Sanford said he was "lying, because my truck was in Nashville."
column4: Kada ga je tužiteljstvo pitalo je li Tellis govorio istinu o tome da je tu noć bio u Sanfordovu kamionu, Sanford je rekao da je „lagao jer je kamion bio u Nashvilleu”.

column3: Another inconsistency was that Tellis said he had known Chambers for about two weeks when she died.
column4: Proturječno je bilo i to što je Tellis izjavio da je Jessicu poznavao oko dva tjedna u vrijeme kada je preminula.

column3: Cellphone records indicated they'd only known each other for a week.
column4: Prema telefonskim podacima poznavali su se samo tjedan dana.

column3: Rowlett said that sometime after Chambers' death, Tellis deleted Chambers' texts, calls and contact information from his phone.
column4: Rowlett je rekao da je neko vrijeme nakon Jessicine smrti Tellis izbrisao Jessicine poruke, pozive i kontaktne podatke sa svojeg telefona.

column3: He erased her from his life, Hale said.
column4: „Izbrisao ju je iz svoga života”, rekao je Hale.

column3: The defense is scheduled to begin its closing arguments Sunday.
column4: Obrana će iznijeti svoju završnu riječ u nedjelju.

column3: The judge said he expected the trial to go to the jury later that day.
column4: Sudac je izjavio da očekuje da će porota odlučivati o presudi kasnije taj dan.

column3: Kanye West: Rapper changes his name to Ye
column4: ﻿Reper Kanye West mijenja ime u „Ye”

column3: Rapper Kanye West is changing his name - to Ye.
column4: Reper Kanye West promijenio je svoje ime u „Ye”.

column3: Announcing the change on Twitter on Saturday, he wrote: "The being formally known as Kanye West."
column4: Promjenu imena objavio je na Twitteru u subotu, kad je napisao: „Biće prethodno poznato kao Kanye West.”

column3: West, 41, has been nicknamed Ye for some time and used the moniker as the title for his eighth album, which was released in June.
column4: West (41) služi se nadimkom Ye već neko vrijeme, a upotrijebio ga je i kao naslov svojeg osmog albuma, koji je izašao u lipnju.

column3: The change comes ahead of his appearance on Saturday Night Live, where he is expected to launch his new album Yandhi.
column4: Promjena se dogodila uoči njegova pojavljivanja u emisiji Saturday Night Live, u kojoj bi trebao promovirati svoj novi album Yandhi.

column3: He replaces singer Ariana Grande on the show who cancelled for "emotional reasons," the show's creator said.
column4: U emisiju dolazi umjesto pjevačice Ariane Grande, koja je otkazala pojavljivanje zbog „emocionalnih razloga”, rekao je tvorac emisije.

column3: As well as being an abbreviation of his current professional name, West has previously said the word has religious significance for him.
column4: Osim što predstavlja skraćenicu njegova trenutačnog umjetničkog imena, West je još prije rekao da ta riječ za njega ima vjerski značaj.

column3: I believe 'ye' is the most commonly used word in the Bible, and in the Bible it means 'you,' West said earlier this year, discussing his album title with radio host Big Boy.
column4: „Mislim da je ‚ye’ najučestalija riječ u Bibliji, gdje ona znači ‚ti’”, rekao je West ranije ove godine dok je raspravljao o nazivu albuma s radijskim voditeljem Big Boyem.

column3:
So I'm you, I'm us, it's us.	„Dakle, ja sam ti, ja sam mi, to smo mi.
bbc.381647	pr01	It went from Kanye, which means the only one, to just Ye - just being a reflection of our good, our bad, our confused, everything.	Prije sam bio Kanye, što znači ‚jedini’, a sad sam Ye, što je odraz naših dobrih, loših, zbunjenih i svih ostalih strana.
bbc.381647	pr01	The album is more of a reflection of who we are.
column4: Taj je album više odraz onoga što smo mi.”

column3: He is one of a number of famous rappers to change their name.
column4: West je jedan od brojnih slavnih repera koji su promijenili ime.

column3: Sean Combs has been variously known as Puff Daddy, P. Diddy or Diddy, but this year announced his preference for the names Love and Brother Love.
column4: Sean Combs bio je poznat pod raznim imenima, poput Puff Daddy, P. Diddy i Diddy, ali je ove godine izjavio da preferira imena Love i Brother Love.

column3: A former West collaborator, JAY-Z, has also made do with or without a hyphen and capitals.
column4: Bivši Westov suradnik JAY-Z također je u svojem imenu eksperimentirao sa spojnicom te velikim i malim slovima.

column3: HIV/Aids: China reports 14% surge in new cases
column4: ﻿HIV/sida: Kina bilježi porast novih slučajeva od 14 %

column3: China has announced a 14% jump in the number of its citizens who are living with HIV and Aids.
column4: Kina je objavila informaciju o skoku od 14 % u broju građana koji žive s virusom HIV-a i sidom.

column3: More than 820,000 people are affected in the country, health officials say.
column4: Zdravstveni radnici kažu da je pogođeno više od 820 000 ljudi u državi,

column3: About 40,000 new cases were reported in the second quarter of 2018 alone.
column4: a oko 40 000 novih slučajeva prijavljeno je samo u drugom tromjesečju 2018. godine.

column3: The vast majority of new cases were transmitted through sex, marking a change from the past.
column4: Virus je u velikoj većini novih slučajeva prenesen spolnim putem, što nije bio slučaj u prošlosti.

column3: Traditionally, HIV spread rapidly through some parts of China as a result of infected blood transfusions.
column4: Uzrok brzog širenja HIV-a u nekim dijelovima Kine svojevremeno je bio je transfuzija zaražene krvi.

column3: But the number of people contracting HIV in this way had been reduced to almost zero, Chinese health officials said at a conference in Yunnan province.
column4: No broj ljudi koji su se HIV-om zarazili na taj način smanjio se gotovo na nulu, rekli su kineski zdravstveni radnici na konferenciji u provinciji Yunnan.

column3: Year-on-year, however, the number of those living with HIV and Aids in China has risen by 100,000 people.
column4: Međutim, tijekom godina broj kineskih građana koji žive s HIV-om i sidom povećao se za 100 000 ljudi.

column3: HIV transmission through sex is an acute issue in China's LGBT community.
column4: Prijenos HIV-a spolnim putem izraženi je problem u kineskoj LGBT-zajednici.

column3: Homosexuality was decriminalised in China in 1997, but discrimination against LGBT people is said to be rife.
column4: Iako je homoseksualnost u Kini dekriminalizirana 1997. godine, diskriminacija prema LGBT osobama u toj državi i dalje je sveprisutna.

column3: Because of the country's conservative values, studies have estimated that 70-90% of men who have sex with men will eventually marry women.
column4: Prema istraživanjima, 70 – 90 % muškaraca koji stupaju u spolne odnose s drugim muškarcima na kraju stupaju u brak sa ženama zbog konzervativnih vrijednosti u toj državi.

column3: Many of the transmissions of the diseases come from inadequate sexual protections in these relationships.
column4: Velik broj slučajeva prijenosa bolesti posljedica je nedostatne seksualne zaštite u takvim odnosima.

column3: Since 2003, China's government has promised universal access to HIV medication as part of an effort to tackle the issue.
column4: U nastojanju rješavanja tih problema, kineska vlada od 2003. godine obećava univerzalni pristup lijekovima za HIV.

column3: Deptford road crash: Cyclist dies in collision with car
column4: ﻿Prometna nesreća u Deptfordu: Biciklist poginuo u sudaru s automobilom

column3: A cyclist has died in a collision involving a car in London.
column4: Biciklist je smrtno stradao u sudaru s automobilom u Londonu.

column3: The crash happened near the junction of Bestwood Street and Evelyn Street, a busy road in Deptford, in the south-east of the city, at about 10:15 BST.
column4: Sudar se dogodio u blizini raskrižja ulica Bestwood i Evelyn, na prometnoj cesti na jugoistoku Deptforda u oko 10.15 h po britanskom ljetnom vremenu.

column3: The driver of the car stopped and paramedics attended, but the man died at the scene.
column4: Vozač automobila se zaustavio i došla je hitna služba, ali je muškarac preminuo na mjestu nesreće.

column3: The crash comes months after another cyclist died in a hit-and-run on Childers Street, about a mile away from Saturday's crash.
column4: Sudar se dogodio nekoliko mjeseci nakon prometne nesreće u ulici Childers, koja se nalazi kilometar i pol dalje. U tom je sudaru također poginuo biciklist, a počinitelj je pobjegao s mjesta nesreće.

column3: The Metropolitan Police said officers were working to identify the man and inform his next-of-kin.
column4: Iz londonske policije izjavili su da rade na utvrđivanju identiteta muškarca i informiranju njegove najbliže rodbine.

column3: Road closures and bus diversions are in place and motorists have been advised to avoid the area.
column4: Postavljene su blokade na cesti i preusmjeren je autobusni promet, a vozačima se savjetuje da izbjegavaju to područje.

column3: Bernard Vann: WW1 Victoria Cross cleric celebrated
column4: ﻿Bernard Vann: svečanost u čast svećenika odlikovanog Viktorijinim križem u Prvom svjetskom ratu

column3: The only Church of England cleric to win a Victoria Cross during World War One as a combatant has been celebrated in his hometown 100 years on.
column4: U rodnom gradu jedinog svećenika Engleske crkve koji je kao borac odlikovan Viktorijinim križem u Prvom svjetskom ratu održana je svečanost njemu u čast točno 100 godina nakon priznanja.

column3: Lt Col The Reverend Bernard Vann won the award on 29 September 1918 in the attack at Bellenglise and Lehaucourt.
column4: Potpukovnik velečasni Bernard Vann odlikovan je 29. rujna 1918. za sudjelovanje u napadu na Bellenglise i Lehaucourt.

column3: However, he was killed by a sniper four days later and never knew he had won the highest British military honour.
column4: Međutim, četiri dana kasnije ubijen je snajperskim hicem i nikad nije saznao da je dobio najvišu britansku vojnu počast.

column3: A commemorative stone was unveiled by his two grandsons at a parade in Rushden, Northamptonshire, on Saturday.
column4: Spomen-ploču su u subotu otkrila njegova dva unuka na svečanosti u gradu Rushdenu u grofoviji Northamptonshire.

column3: One of his grandsons, Michael Vann, said it was "brilliantly symbolic" the stone would be revealed exactly 100 years on from his grandfather's award-winning feat.
column4: Jedan od njegovih unuka, Michael Vann, rekao je da u činjenici da je spomen-ploča postavljena točno 100 godina nakon bitke koja je donijela njegovu djedu odlikovanje leži prekrasna simbolika.

column3: According to the London Gazette, on 29 September 1918 Lt Col Vann led his battalion across the Canal de Saint-Quentin "through a very thick fog and under heavy fire from field and machine guns."
column4: Prema novinskom izvještaju u London Gazetteu potpukovnik Vann predvodio je 29. rujna 1918. bataljun preko kanala Saint-Quentin „kroz vrlo gustu maglu i pod žestokom paljbom topova i puškostrojnica”.

column3: He later rushed up to the firing line and with the "greatest gallantry" led the line forward before rushing a field-gun single-handed and knocked out three of the detachment.
column4: Nakon toga je izbio u prve redove i predvodio ih s najvećom hrabrošću, pri čemu je sam napao posadu jednog topa i savladao trojicu neprijateljskih vojnika.

column3: Lt Col Vann was killed by a German sniper on 4 October 1918 - just over a month before the war ended.
column4: Potpukovnik Vann ubijen je hicem njemačkog snajperista 4. listopada 1918., nešto više od mjesec dana prije kraja rata.

column3: Michael Vann, 72, said his grandfather's actions were "something that I know that I could never live up to but something which is humbling."
column4: Michael Vann (72) izjavio je da su djela njegova djeda „nešto što u životu sigurno nikad neću dostići i što me čini poniznim”.

column3: He and his brother Dr James Vann also laid a wreath after the parade, which was led by the Brentwood Imperial Youth Band.
column4: On i njegov brat James Vann položili su vijenac nakon svečanosti koju je predvodio orkestar limene glazbe Brentwood Imperial Youth Band.

column3: Michael Vann said he was "feeling very honoured to play a part in the parade" and added "the valour of a genuine hero is being demonstrated by the support that is going to be given by a lot of people."
column4: Michael Vann rekao je da mu je „bila velika čast sudjelovati u svečanosti” i dodao da na „junaštvo istinskog heroja ukazuje podrška koju pružaju mnogi ljudi”.

column3: The High Breed: What is conscious hip hop?
column4: ﻿The High Breed: što je društveno osviješteni hip-hop?

column3: A hip hop trio wants to challenge the negative view of the genre by filling their music with positive messages.
column4: Hip-hop trojac želi se suprotstaviti negativnim mišljenjima o žanru slanjem pozitivnih poruka putem svoje glazbe.

column3: The High Breed, from Bristol, claim hip hop moved away from its origins of political messages and tackling social issues.
column4: The High Breed iz Bristola tvrde da se hip-hop odmaknuo od svojih korijena kad je nosio političke poruke i tematizirao društvene probleme.

column3: They want to go back to its roots and make conscious hip hop popular again.
column4: Žele se vratiti korijenima i vratiti popularnost društveno osviještenom hip-hopu.

column3: Artists like The Fugees and Common have seen a recent resurgence in the UK through artists such as Akala and Lowkey.
column4: Izvođači kao što su The Fugees i Common doživljavaju preporod u Ujedinjenom Kraljevstvu zahvaljujući izvođačima kao što su Akala i Lowkey.

column3: Attempted murder charge over Belfast restaurant stabbing
column4: ﻿Optužba za pokušaj ubojstva nanošenjem ubodne ozljede u restoranu u Belfastu

column3: A 45-year-old man has been charged with attempted murder after a man was stabbed in a restaurant in east Belfast on Friday.
column4: Nakon što je u petak muškarac izboden u restoranu u istočnom dijelu Belfasta, 45-godišnjak je optužen za pokušaj ubojstva.

column3: The incident happened in Ballyhackamore, police said.
column4: Policija je priopćila da se incident dogodio u predgrađu Ballyhackamore.

column3: The defendant is expected to appear before Belfast Magistrates' Court on Monday.
column4: Očekuje se da će se optuženik pojaviti pred Prekršajnim sudom u Belfastu u ponedjeljak.

column3: The charges will be reviewed by the Public Prosecution Service.
column4: Državno odvjetništvo razmotrit će optužbe.

column3: Elite League: Dundee Stars 5-3 Belfast Giants
column4: ﻿Elitna liga: Dundee Stars pobijedili Belfast Giantse 5:3

column3: Patrick Dwyer hit two goals for the Giants against Dundee
column4: Patrick Dwyer zabio je dva gola za Giantse protiv Dundeeja

column3: Dundee Stars atoned for Friday's Elite League loss against Belfast Giants by winning the return match 5-3 in Dundee on Saturday.
column4: Dundee Stars u subotu su se iskupili za poraz koji su u petak pretrpjeli u utakmici Elitne lige pobjedom od 5:3 protiv Belfast Giantsa u uzvratnom susretu u Dundeeju.

column3: The Giants got an early two-goal lead through strikes from Patrick Dwyer and Francis Beauvillier.
column4: Giantsi su rano poveli s dva gola Patricka Dwyera i Francisa Beauvilliera.

column3: Mike Sullivan and Jordan Cownie brought the home side level before Dwyer restored the Giants' lead.
column4: Mike Sullivan i Jordan Cownie izjednačili su rezultat za domaće prije nego što je Dwyer ponovo poveo za Giantse.

column3: Francois Bouchard equalised for Dundee before two Lukas Lundvald Nielsen goals secured their victory.
column4: Francois Bouchard izjednačio je rezultat za Dundeeje prije nego što su dva gola Lukasa Lundvalda Nielsena osigurala pobjedu.

column3: It was a third Elite League defeat of the season for Adam Keefe's men, who had come from behind to beat Dundee 2-1 in Belfast on Friday night.
column4: To je za momčad Adama Keefea bio treći poraz ove sezone u Elitnoj ligi nakon što su pobijedili Dundeeje 2:1 u petak navečer u Belfastu.

column3: It was a fourth meeting of the season between the sides, with the Giants winning the previous three matches.
column4: Bio je to njihov četvrti susret ove sezone, a Giantsi su pobijedili u prethodne tri utakmice.

column3: Dwyer's opener came in the fourth minute on 3:35 from a Kendall McFaull assist, with David Rutherford providing the assist as Beauvillier doubled the lead four minutes later.
column4: Dwyer je prvi gol zabio u četvrtoj minuti, 3:35 minute nakon početka utakmice, a asistirao mu je Kendall McFaull. David Rutherford asistirao je Beauvillieru četiri minute nakon toga i njihovo se vodstvo tada udvostručilo.

column3: In what was a busy opening period, Sullivan brought the home side back into the game on 13:10 before Matt Marquardt became provider for Cownie's equaliser on 15:16.
column4: U dinamičnom početku utakmice Sullivan je vratio domaću momčad u igru 13:10 minuta nakon početka, prije nego što je Matt Marquardt asistirao Cownieju u izjednačenju 15:16 minuta nakon početka.

column3: Dwyer made sure the Giants took a lead into the first break when he hit his second goal of the night at the end of the first period.
column4: Dwyer se pobrinuo za to da Giantsi u prvoj pauzi imaju vodstvo kada je zabio drugi gol te večeri nakon prve trećine.

column3: The home side regrouped and Bouchard once again put them on level terms with a power play goal on 27:37.
column4: Domaća momčad regrupirala se i Bouchard je ponovno izjednačio igru golom 27:37 minuta nakon početka dok je njegova momčad bila u brojčanoj prednosti.

column3: Cownie and Charles Corcoran combined to help Nielsen give Dundee the lead for the first time in the match late in the second period and he made sure of the win with his team's fifth halfway through the final period.
column4: Cownie i Charles Corcoran zajedno su pomogli Nielsenu da kasno u drugoj trećini za Dundeeje osigura vodstvo prvi put u toj utakmici, a na polovici zadnje trećine Nielsen je osigurao pobjedu za svoj brojčano slabiji tim.

column3: The Giants, who have now lost four of their last five matches, are at home to Milton Keynes in their next match on Friday.
column4: Nakon izgubljene četiri od zadnjih pet utakmica, Giantsi će na domaćem terenu u petak igrati utakmicu protiv Milton Keynesa.

column3: Long Lartin prison: Six officers hurt in disorder
column4: ﻿Zatvor Long Lartin: šest policajaca ozlijeđeno u neredima

column3: Six prison officers have been injured in a disturbance at a high security men's jail, the Prison Office has said.
column4: Šest zatvorskih policajaca ozlijeđeno je u neredima u strogo čuvanom zatvoru za muškarce, priopćila je zatvorska uprava.

column3: Disorder broke out at HMP Long Lartin in Worcestershire at about 09:30 BST on Sunday and is ongoing.
column4: Neredi su u zatvoru HMP Long Lartin u Worcestershireu izbili u nedjelju otprilike u 10:30 (CET) i još uvijek traju.

column3: Specialist "Tornado" officers have been brought in to deal with the disturbance, which involves eight inmates and is contained to one wing.
column4: Za smirivanje nereda u kojima sudjeluje osam zatvorenika u jednom zatvorskom krilu dovedena je specijalna jedinica „Tornado”.

column3: The officers were treated for minor facial injuries at the scene.
column4: Policajcima je na licu mjesta pružena zdravstvena skrb zbog lakših ozljeda na licu.

column3: A Prison Service spokesperson said: "Specially trained prison staff have been deployed to deal with an ongoing incident at HMP Long Lartin.
column4: Glasnogovornik zatvorske uprave priopćio je: „Posebno obučeno zatvorsko osoblje dobilo je zadatak da riješi incident koji i dalje traje u zatvoru HMP Long Lartin.

column3: Six members of staff have been treated for injuries.
column4: Šest članova osoblja primilo je zdravstvenu skrb zbog ozljeda.

column3: We do not tolerate violence in our prisons, and are clear that those responsible will be referred to the police and could spend longer behind bars."
column4: Mi ne toleriramo nasilje u svojim zatvorima i jasno je da će se odgovorne osobe predati policiji i da bi mogle provesti još više vremena iza rešetaka.”

column3: HMP Long Lartin holds more than 500 prisoners, including some of the country's most dangerous offenders.
column4: HMP Long Lartin ima više od 500 zatvorenika, uključujući neke od najopasnijih prijestupnika u zemlji.

column3: In June it was reported that the prison's governor received hospital treatment after being attacked by a prisoner.
column4: U lipnju je prijavljeno da je upravitelj zatvora primio zdravstvenu skrb u bolnici nakon što ga je napao zatvorenik.

column3: And in October last year riot officers were called to the prison to deal with a serious disturbance in which staff were attacked with pool balls.
column4: U listopadu prošle godine službenici zaduženi za pobune pozvani su u zatvor da se bave ozbiljnim neredima u kojima je osoblje napadnuto biljarskim kuglama.

column3: North Korea defector numbers 'drop' under Kim
column4: ﻿Za vladavine Kima „smanjio se” broj prebjega u Sjevernoj Koreji

column3: The number of North Korean defectors to South Korea has fallen since Kim Jong-un came to power seven years ago, a South Korean lawmaker has said.
column4: Broj sjevernokorejskih prebjega u Južnu Koreju smanjio se od kada je Kim Jong-un došao na vlast prije sedam godina, izjavio je južnokorejski zastupnik.

column3: Park Byeong-seug, citing data from the South's unification ministry, said there had been 1,127 defections last year - compared with 2,706 in 2011.
column4: Park Byeong-seug citirao je podatke iz južnokorejskog ministarstvo za ujedinjenje te izjavio kako je prošle godine bilo 1127 prebjega u odnosu na 2706 prebjega 2011. godine.

column3: Mr Park said tighter border controls between North Korea and China and higher rates charged by people smugglers were key factors.
column4: G. Park kazao je kako su ključni razlozi tome strože granične kontrole između Sjeverne Koreje i Kine te veći iznosi koje zahtijevaju krijumčari ljudi.

column3: Pyongyang has made no public comments.
column4: Pyongyang nije javno komentirao te navode.

column3: The vast majority of defectors from the North are eventually offered South Korean citizenship.
column4: Velikoj većini prebjega iz Sjeverne Koreje na kraju se ponudi južnokorejsko državljanstvo.

column3: Seoul says more than 30,000 North Koreans have illegally crossed the border since the end of the Korean War in 1953.
column4: Seoul izjavljuje kako je više od 30 000 državljana Sjeverne Koreje ilegalno prešlo granicu od okončanja Korejskog rata 1953. godine.

column3: Most flee via China, which has the longest border with North Korea and is easier to cross than the heavily protected Demilitarised Zone (DMZ) between the two Koreas.
column4: Većina bježi preko Kine koja ima najdužu granicu sa Sjevernom Korejom i lakše se prelazi od strogo čuvane demilitarizirane zone (DMZ) između dviju Koreja.

column3: China regards the defectors as illegal migrants rather than refugees and often forcibly repatriates them.
column4: Kina prebjege smatra nezakonitim migrantima, a ne izbjeglicama, i često ih prisilno vraća.

column3: Relations between the North and the South - who are still technically at war - have markedly improved in recent months.
column4: Odnosi između Sjeverne i Južne Koreje, koje su još uvijek tehnički u ratu, znatno su se poboljšali posljednjih mjeseci.

column3: Earlier this month, the leaders of the two countries met in Pyongyang for talks that centred on the stalled denuclearisation negotiations.
column4: Ranije ovoga mjeseca čelnici dviju zemalja sastali su se u Pyongyangu na razgovorima koji su bili usredotočeni na pregovore o denuklearizaciji koji su se razvukli.

column3: This came after June's historic meeting between US President Donald Trump and Kim Jong-un in Singapore, when they agreed in broad terms to work towards the nuclear-free Korean peninsula.
column4: To se dogodilo nakon lipanjskog povijesnog sastanka predsjednika Sjedinjenih Američkih Država Donalda Trumpa i Kim Jong-una u Singapuru, kada su se okvirno složili da će raditi na denuklearizaciji Korejskog poluotoka.

column3: But on Saturday, North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong-ho blamed US sanctions for the lack of progress since then.
column4: Međutim, sjevernokorejski ministar vanjskih poslova Ri Yong-ho u subotu je okrivio sankcije Sjedinjenih Američkih Država za nedostatak napretka od tada.

column3: Without any trust in the US, there will be no confidence in our national security and under such circumstances, there is no way we will unilaterally disarm ourselves first, Mr Ri said in a speech to the UN General Assembly in New York.
column4: „Bez ikakvog povjerenja u SAD neće biti ni povjerenja u našu nacionalnu sigurnost i u takvim okolnostima ne dolazi u obzir da se prvi jednostrano razoružamo”, kazao je g. Ri u govoru u Općoj skupštini UN-a u New Yorku.

column3: Man shot multiple times with air rifle in Ilfracombe
column4: ﻿Muškarac višestruko nastrijeljen zračnom puškom u Ilfracombeu

column3: A man has been shot multiple times with an air rifle as he walked home from a night out.
column4: Muškarac je više puta nastrijeljen zračnom puškom dok se pješke vraćao doma nakon večernjeg izlaska.

column3: The victim, in his 40s, was in the Oxford Grove area of Ilfracombe, Devon, when he was shot in the chest, abdomen and hand.
column4: Žrtva je u 40-im godinama i nalazila se u ulici Oxford Grove u Ilfracombeu, okrugu Devon, kada je nastrijeljena u prsa, abdomen i ruku.

column3: Officers described the shooting, which took place at about 02:30 BST, as a "random act."
column4: Policajci su opisali pucnjavu, koja se dogodila oko 2:30 po britanskom standardnom vremenu, kao „nasumičnu”.

column3: The victim did not see his attacker.
column4: Žrtva nije vidjela napadača.

column3: His injuries are not life-threatening and police have appealed for witnesses.
column4: Ozljede koje je zadobila nisu opasne po život i policija traži svjedoke da se jave.

column3: Midsomer Norton attack: Four attempted murder arrests
column4: ﻿Napad u Midsomer Nortonu: četvero uhićenih zbog pokušaja ubojstva

column3: Three teenage boys and a 20-year-old man have been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after a 16-year-old was found with stab wounds in Somerset.
column4: Tri tinejdžera i 20-godišnjak uhićeni su zbog sumnje na pokušaj ubojstva nakon što je u Somersetu pronađen 16-godišnjak s ubodnim ranama.

column3: The teenage boy was found injured in the Excelsior Terrace area of Midsomer Norton, at about 04:00 BST on Saturday.
column4: Tinejdžer je pronađen ozlijeđen u ulici Excelsior Terrace u Midsomer Nortonu u subotu oko 4:00 po britanskom standardnom vremenu.

column3: He was taken to hospital where he remains in a "stable" condition.
column4: Odvezen je u bolnicu i stanje mu je „stabilno”.

column3: A 17-year-old, two 18-year-olds and a 20-year-old man were arrested overnight in the Radstock area, Avon and Somerset Police said.
column4: Tijekom noći su na području grada Radstocka uhićeni 17-godišnjak, dva 18-godišnjaka i 20-godišnjak, rekla je policija Avona i Somerseta.

column3: Officers have appealed for anyone who may have any mobile phone footage of what happened to come forward.
column4: Policija traži da se jave svi koji možda imaju telefonsku snimku događaja.

column3: Londonderry: Men arrested after house rammed by car
column4: ﻿Londonderry: muškarci uhićeni nakon zabijanja automobilom u kuću

column3: Three men, aged 33, 34 and 39, have been arrested after a car was repeatedly rammed into a house in Londonderry.
column4: Tri muškarca u dobi od 33, 34 i 39 godina uhićena su nakon što su se više puta zabili autom u kuću u Londonderryju.

column3: The incident unfolded in Ballynagard Crescent on Thursday at about 19:30 BST.
column4: Incident se dogodio u ulici Ballynagard Crescent u četvrtak oko 19:30 po britanskom standardnom vremenu.

column3: Det Insp Bob Blemmings said damage was caused to the gates and the building itself.
column4: Inspektor Bob Blemmings rekao je da su oštećena dvorišna vrata i sama kuća.

column3: A crossbow may also have been fired at the car at some point.
column4: U nekom je trenutku automobil možda i pogođen samostrelom.

column3: Wayde Sims shooting: Police arrest suspect Dyteon Simpson in LSU player's death
column4: ﻿Ubojstvo Waydea Simsa: policija je uhitila Dyteona Simpsona, osumnjičenog za smrt igrača Državnog sveučilišta u Louisiani (LSU)

column3: Police have arrested a suspect in the fatal shooting death of Wayde Sims, a 20-year-old basketball player at LSU.
column4: Policija je uhitila osumnjičenika za ubojstvo Waydea Simsa, 20-godišnjeg košarkaša momčadi LSU.

column3: Dyteon Simpson, 20, has been arrested and booked into prison on a second-degree murder charge, the Baton Rouge Police Department said.
column4: Dyteon Simpson (20) uhićen je i zadržan u zatvoru pod optužbom za ubojstvo drugog stupnja, priopćila je Policijska uprava Baton Rougea.

column3: Officials released video of the confrontation between Sims and Simpson, and police said Sims lost his glasses during the fight.
column4: Policijski dužnosnici objavili su i videozapis sukoba Simsa i Simpsona, a policija je napomenula da je Sims izgubio naočale za vrijeme tučnjave.

column3: Police recovered the glasses from the scene and said they found Simpson's DNA on them, CBS affiliate WAFB reports.
column4: Policija je pronašla naočale na mjestu događaja i ustvrdila da je na njima pronađen Simpsonov DNK, izvijestilo je CBS-ovo povezano društvo WAFB.

column3: After questioning Simpson, police said he admitted to fatally shooting Wayde.
column4: Policija je navela da je Simpson nakon ispitivanja priznao da je ubio Waydea.

column3: His bond has been set at $350,000, the Advocate reports.
column4: Određena mu je jamčevina u iznosu od 350.000 američkih dolara, izvijestile su novine The Advocate.

column3: The East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office released a preliminary report Friday, saying the cause of death is a gunshot wound to the head into the neck.
column4: Općinski ured mrtvozornika istočnog Baton Rougea objavio je preliminarno izvješće u petak, prema kojem je uzrok smrti prostrijelna rana glave i vrata.

column3: The department is crediting the Louisiana State Police fugitive task force, the state police crime lab, Southern University police and area citizens in assisting in the investigation leading to the arrest.
column4: Policijska uprava pohvalila je posebnu jedinicu za hvatanje bjegunaca Državne policije Louisiane, kriminalistički laboratorij državne policije, policiju Sveučilišta Southern i građane u pružanju podrške istrazi koja je dovela do uhićenja.

column3: LSU athletic director Joe Alleva thanked area law enforcement for its "diligence and pursuit of justice."
column4: Sportski direktor LSU-a Joe Alleva zahvalio je područnim službama zaduženima za provedbu zakona na vrijednom radu i borbi za pravdu.

column3: Sims was 20 years old.
column4: Sims je imao 20 godina.

column3: The 6-foot-6 forward grew up in Baton Rouge, where his father, Wayne, also played basketball for LSU.
column4: Krilni centar visok 201 cm odrastao je u Baton Rougeu, gdje je i njegov otac Wayne igrao košarku za LSU.

column3: He averaged 5.6 points and 2.6 rebounds a game last season.
column4: Prošle sezone imao je prosjek od 5,6 koševa i 2,6 skokova po utakmici.

column3: On Friday morning, LSU basketball coach Will Wade said the team is "devastated" and "in shock" by Wayde's death.
column4: U petak ujutro trener košarkaške momčadi LSU-a Will Wade izjavio je da je momčad shrvana i u šoku zbog Waydeove smrti.

column3: This is what you worry about at all times, Wade said.
column4: „Dogodilo se ono čega se uvijek najviše bojimo”, rekao je Wade.

column3: Nancy Pelosi calls Brett Kavanaugh "hysterical," says he is unfit to serve on the Supreme Court
column4: ﻿Nancy Pelosi nazvala Bretta Kavanaugha „histeričnim” i nesposobnim za službu na Vrhovnom sudu

column3: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi called Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh "hysterical" and said that he was temperamentally unfit to serve on the Supreme Court.
column4: Voditeljica opozicije Nancy Pelosi nazvala je kandidata za Vrhovni sud Sjedinjenih Američkih Država Bretta Kavanaugha „histeričnim” i rekla da zbog svoje naravi nije sposoban za službu na Vrhovnom sudu.

column3: Pelosi made the comments in an interview Saturday at the Texas Tribune Festival in Austin, Texas.
column4: Pelosi je iznijela te komentare u intervjuu na Texas Tribune Festivalu u teksaškom gradu Austinu ove subote.

column3: I couldn't help but think that if a woman had ever performed that way, they would say 'hysterical,' Pelosi said about her reaction to Kavanaugh's testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Thursday.
column4: „Ne mogu se oteti dojmu da bi ženu koja se tako ponaša ljudi nazvali ‚histeričnom’”, odgovorila je na pitanje o svojoj reakciji na Kavanaughovo svjedočenje pred pravosudnim odborom Senata u četvrtak.

column3: Kavanaugh emotionally denied allegations that he had sexually assaulted Dr. Christine Blasey Ford when they were both teenagers.
column4: Kavanaugh je emotivno odbacivao optužbe da je seksualno napastovao dr. Christine Blasey Ford dok su bili tinejdžeri.

column3: During his opening statement, Kavanaugh was very emotional, at times nearly shouting and choking up while discussing his family and his high school years.
column4: U svojoj uvodnoj izjavi Kavanaugh je bio veoma emotivan te je u određenim trenucima gotovo vikao i gubio glas pričajući o svojoj obitelji i vremenu provedenom u srednjoj školi.

column3: He also explicitly condemned Democrats on the committee, calling the allegations against him a "grotesque and coordinated character assassination" organized by liberals angry that Hillary Clinton lost the 2016 presidential election.
column4: Također je otvoreno osudio demokrate u odboru, nazivajući optužbe koje su mu upućene „grotesknim i koordiniranim klevetama” koje su osmislili liberali ljuti što je Hillary Clinton izgubila predsjedničke izbore 2016. godine.

column3: Pelosi said that she believed Kavanaugh's testimony proved that he could not serve on the Supreme Court, because it showed that he is biased against Democrats.
column4: Pelosi je rekla da smatra da Kavanaughovo svjedočenje dokazuje da on ne može služiti na Vrhovnom sudu jer pokazuje da ima predrasude prema demokratima.

column3: I think that he disqualifies himself with those statements and the manner in which he went after the Clintons and the Democrats, she said.
column4: „Mislim da se diskvalificirao tim izjavama i načinom na koji se obrušio na Clintone i demokrate”, rekla je.

column3: Pelosi demurred when asked if she would try to impeach Kavanaugh if he is confirmed, and if Democrats gain the majority in the House of Representatives.
column4: Pelosi je zastala kad joj je postavljeno pitanje bi li pokušala opozvati Kavanaugha u slučaju da dođe na taj položaj i da demokrati dobiju većinu u Zastupničkom domu Sjedinjenih Američkih država.

column3: I will say this -- if he is not telling the truth to Congress or to the FBI, then he's not fit not only to be on the Supreme Court, but to be on the court he's on right now, Pelosi said.
column4: „Reći ću sljedeće: ako ne govori istinu Kongresu i FBI-u, onda nije podoban ne sa samo za službu na Vrhovnom sudu, nego i na sudu na kojem je sada”, rekla je Pelosi.

column3: Kavanaugh is currently a judge on the D.C. Circuit Court of Appeals.
column4: Kavanaugh je trenutačno sudac na Prizivnom sudu za Washington D.C.

column3: Pelosi added that as a Democrat she was concerned about potential Kavanaugh rulings against the Affordable Care Act or Roe v. Wade, as he is considered to be a conservative justice.
column4: Pelosi je dodala da je kao demokratkinju zabrinjavaju presude koje bi Kavanaugh mogao donijeti u slučaju cjenovno pristupačne skrbi i slučaju Roe protiv Wadea zbog toga što ga se smatra konzervativnim sucem.

column3: In his confirmation hearings, Kavanaugh sidestepped questions on whether he would overturn certain Supreme Court decisions.
column4: U saslušanjima za imenovanje Kavanaugh je zaobišao pitanja o tome bi li poništio određene odluke Vrhovnog suda.

column3: It's not time for a hysterical, biased person to go to the court and expect us to say, 'isn't that wonderful,' Pelosi said.
column4: „Nije vrijeme da histerična, pristrana osoba dođe pred sud i očekuje od nas da kažemo ‚nije li to divno?’”, rekla je Pelosi.

column3: Lindsey Graham, John Kennedy tell "60 Minutes" whether the FBI's investigation of Kavanaugh could change their minds
column4: ﻿Senatori Lindsey Graham i John Kennedy u emisiji „60 Minutes” govore o tome može li im FBI-jeva istraga o Kavanaughu promijeniti mišljenje

column3: The FBI investigation into accusations against Judge Brett Kavanaugh has delayed a final vote on his nomination to the Supreme Court by at least a week, and raises the question of whether the bureau's findings could sway any Republican senators into pulling their support.
column4: FBI-jeva istraga zbog optužbi protiv suca Bretta Kavanaugha odgodila je konačno glasovanje o njegovu imenovanju za suca Vrhovnog suda za najmanje tjedan dana i postavlja se pitanje hoće li se zbog rezultata istrage bilo koji republikanski senator predomisliti i povući svoju potporu.

column3: In an interview airing Sunday, "60 Minutes" correspondent Scott Pelley asked Republicans Sens. John Kennedy and Lindsey Graham whether the FBI could unearth anything that would lead them to change their minds.

column3: Almanac: The inventor of the Geiger Counter
column4: ﻿Almanah: izumitelj Geigerova brojača

column3: And now a page from our "Sunday Morning" Almanac: September 30, 1882, 136 years ago today, and COUNTING ... the day the future physicist Johannes Wilhelm "Hans" Geiger was born in Germany.
column4: A sada zanimljivost iz našeg nedjeljnog jutarnjeg almanaha: 30. rujna 1882., na ovaj dan prije 136 godina, a BROJIMO i dalje ... budući fizičar Johannes Wilhelm „Hans” Geiger rođen je u Njemačkoj.

column3: Geiger developed a method for detecting and measuring radioactivity, an invention that eventually led to the device known as the Geiger Counter.
column4: Geiger je razvio metodu za otkrivanje i mjerenje radioaktivnosti, izum koji je s vremenom doveo do uređaja poznatog kao Geigerov brojač.

column3: A mainstay of science ever since, the Geiger Counter became a pop culture mainstay as well, as in the 1950 movie "Bells of Coronado," starring those seemingly unlikely cowpoke scientists Roy Rogers and Dale Evans:
column4: Geigerov brojač otad je jedan od temelja znanosti, a postao je i prepoznatljiv simbol u pop-kulturi, primjerice u filmu „Bells of Coronado” iz 1950. u kojem Roy Rogers i Dale Evans glume nesvakidašnje kauboje znanstvenike:

column3: Man: "What in the world is that?"
column4: Muškarac: „Što je to, pobogu?”

column3: Rogers: "It's a Geiger Counter, used to locate radioactive minerals, such as uranium.
column4: Rogers: „To je Geigerov brojač, koji se upotrebljava za pronalazak radioaktivnih minerala, kao što je uranij.

column3: When you put these earphones on, you can actually hear the effects of the atoms given off by the radioactivity in the minerals."
column4: Kada staviš ove slušalice na uši, možeš čuti zvukove atoma koji su proizvod radioaktivnog zračenja minerala.”

column3: Evans: "Say, it sure is popping now!"
column4: Evans: „Ovdje je stvarno glasno!”

column3: Hans Geiger died in 1945, just a few days short of his 63rd birthday.
column4: „Hans” Geiger preminuo je 1945., samo nekoliko dana prije svojeg 63. rođendana.

column3: But the invention that bears his name lives on.
column4: No izum koji nosi njegovo ime i dalje živi.

column3: Immanuel Christian School: Sixth-grade boys accused of pinning down black girl and cutting off her dreadlocks in Virginia
column4: ﻿Kršćanska škola Immanuel u Virginiji: učenici šestog razreda optuženi da su sputali crnu djevojčicu i odrezali joj dreadlockse

column3: A black middle school student from Virginia is accusing three white boys of pinning her down and cutting off her dreadlocks. The incident took place at Immanuel Christian School - where Vice President Mike Pence's wife, Karen Pence, is a teacher.
column4: Crna učenica osnovne škole iz Virginije optužila je trojicu bijelih dječaka da su je sputali i odrezali joj dreadlockse. Incident se dogodio u Kršćanskoj školi Immanuel (Immanuel Christian School), gdje žena bivšeg potpredsjednika Mikea Pencea, Karen Pence, radi kao nastavnica.

column3: Amari Allen, a 12-year-old student at the private K-12 Christian school, said the boys called her dreadlocks "ugly" and "nappy" before cutting them off on the playground during recess.
column4: Amari Allen, dvanaestogodišnja učenica privatne osnovne škole, rekla je da su dječaci nazvali njezine dreadlockse „ružnim” i „neurednim”, nakon čega su joj odrezali kosu na igralištu tijekom odmora.

column3: They kept laughing and calling me names, Amari told CBS affiliate WUSA-TV, tearing up. "They called me 'ugly,' said, 'I shouldn't have been born.' They called me 'an attention-seeker.'"
column4: „Neprestano su mi se smijali i nazivali me ružnim imenima”, sa suzama u očima Amari je rekla novinarima CBS-ova WUSA-TV-a. „Rekli su mi da sam ‚ružna’ i da bi bilo bolje da se nisam rodila”, rekla je. „Rekli su mi da samo pokušavam privući pozornost.”

column3: According to WUSA, one of the boys allegedly covered Amari's mouth while another held her hands behind her back and a third took a pair of scissors to her dreadlocks.
column4: WUSA je izvijestila da je jedan od dječaka navodno pokrio Amari usta dok joj je drugi držao ruke iza leđa, a treći škarama rezao dreadlockse.

column3: Amari didn't tell her family about the incident until after her grandmother noticed the length of her hair had changed.
column4: Amari nije htjela reći svojoj obitelji za taj incident sve dok njezina baka nije primijetila da joj je kosa kraća.

column3: They ran off laughing, and I was just sitting there, Amari said.
column4: „Pobjegli su smijući se, a ja sam samo sjedila na mjestu”, rekla je Amari.

column3: The alleged incident occurred on Monday, but the shy preteen said she didn't tell her family about it until Wednesday, after her grandmother noticed her hair looked different. She feared retaliation if she confessed the truth, she said.
column4: Incident se navodno dogodio se u ponedjeljak, ali sramežljiva djevojčica rekla je da to nije podijelila sa svojom obitelji do srijede, nakon što je njezina baka primijetila da joj kosa izgleda drukčije. Rekla je da se bojala osvete ako prizna istinu.

column3: It's very painful, said Cynthia Allen, Amari's grandmother. "I want to see them dismissed from the school. I want to see something done."
column4: „To je veoma bolno”, rekla je Amarina baka Cynthia Allen. „Želim da ih izbace iz škole. Želim da se nešto poduzme.”

column3: Allen's family pays nearly $12,000 per year for Amari to attend the school, which made headlines earlier this year after Karen Pence took an art teaching job at the famously anti-LGBTQ institution.
column4: Amarina obitelj plaća gotovo 12 000 dolara godišnje da bi Amari mogla pohađati školu koja je dospjela na naslovnice ranije ove godine nakon što se Karen Pence zaposlila kao nastavnica likovne kulture u toj instituciji poznatoj po negativnim stavovima prema pripadnicima LGBT skupine.

column3: We take seriously the emotional and physical well-being of all our students, and have a zero-tolerance policy for any kind of bullying or abuse, Immanuel Christian School said in a statement. "We are deeply disturbed by the allegations being made, and are in communication with the family of the alleged victim to gather information and provide whatever support we can. We have also reached out to law enforcement to ask them to conduct a thorough investigation, and further inquiries should be directed to the Fairfax County Police."
column4: „Ozbiljno shvaćamo emocionalnu i fizičku dobrobit svih naših učenika i imamo nultu stopu tolerancije prema bilo kakvoj vrsti maltretiranja ili zlostavljanja”, stoji u izjavi Kršćanske škole Immanuel. „Te su nas tvrdnje duboko potresle te smo u kontaktu s obitelji navodne žrtve da bismo prikupili informacije i pružili kakvu god potporu možemo. Također smo se obratili policiji i zatražili provedbu temeljite istrage, tako da daljnja pitanja treba uputiti policiji okruga Fairfax.”

column3: While the school has a zero-tolerance policy for bullying, Amari said the boys had previously tormented her. She said that the boys have taken her lunch and called her names in the past.
column4: Iako škola ima nultu toleranciju prema nasilju, Amari kaže da su je ti dječaci i prije maltretirali. Rekla je da su joj dječaci prije uzimali ručak i zvali je pogrdnim imenima.

column3: Amari's family met with school officials Thursday, and the investigation is ongoing.
column4: Amarina obitelj sastala se sa službenicima škole u četvrtak, a istraga je još u tijeku.

column3: Midway Broadcasting announced today that its Chairwoman, Melody Spann Cooper is set to release her highly anticipated book to help female entrepreneurs and executives thrive in business. "The Girlfriend's Guide To Closing the Deal" shares insights on how women can use their voice to achieve equity at the negotiating table and advance their careers by using the female edition of the old-boy's network.
column4: ﻿Društvo Midway Broadcasting danas je objavilo da će njegova direktorica Melody Spann Cooper uskoro objaviti svoju dugoočekivanu knjigu za pomoć poduzetnicama i rukovoditeljicama u ostvarivanju poslovnih uspjeha. „The Girlfriend's Guide To Closing the Deal” (Vodič za sklapanje poslova za žene) pruža uvid u načine na koje žene mogu postići ravnopravnost za pregovaračkim stolom i unaprijediti karijeru koristeći se ženskom verzijom zatvorenih muških društava.

column3: Throughout the book, Spann Cooper uses anecdotal references to deal with challenging issues including the #MeToo movement and Hillary Clinton's Presidential defeat and its impact on fueling the female empowerment in America.
column4: Spann Cooper u knjizi se na anegdotalan način suočava s važnim pitanjima, uključujući pokret #MeToo i poraz Hillary Clinton na predsjedničkim izborima, kao i s utjecajem tih zbivanja na osnaživanje žena u SAD-u.

column3: The self-published book is the result of a groundbreaking self-entitled speech that Spann Cooper delivered as a keynote address at The National Association of Women Business Owners Conference in Chicago in 2017. The Girlfriend's Guide to Closing The Deal is written in a down-to-earth style that every "girlfriend" can relate.
column4: Knjiga objavljena u vlastitoj nakladi rezultat je revolucionarnog samosvjesnog govora koji je Spann Cooper održala kao središnje predavanje na konferenciji Nacionalnog udruženja žena vlasnica poduzeća u Chicagu 2017. Knjiga „The Girlfriend's Guide To Closing the Deal” pisana je jednostavnim stilom s kojim se svaka žena može poistovjetiti.

column3: Christie Hefner, businesswoman and daughter of Playboy Founder, Hugh Hefner, says "The Girlfriend's Guide to Closing The Deal" is both highly entertaining and very helpful. Melody weaves together personal anecdotes, triumphs, and setbacks with useful lessons learned. From how to own your ideas in a meeting to when its time to "friend up," everyone can benefit from Melody's story."
column4: Christie Hefner, poslovna žena i kći osnivača Playboya Hugha Hefnera izjavila je: „‚The Girlfriend's Guide To Closing the Deal’ istovremeno je vrlo zabavna i vrlo korisna knjiga. Melody navodi osobne anegdote, uspjehe i poraze, kao i korisne lekcije koje je naučila. Svatko može imati koristi od Melodyjine priče i naučiti kako čvrsto stajati iza svojih ideja na sastanku ili kad je vrijeme za prijateljski pristup.”

column3: As Chairman of Midway Broadcasting Corporation, she joined an elite list of America's female broadcast owners after purchasing the company's controlling interest in 1999. Midway Broadcasting Corporation is a best-in-class female and family-owned media boutique whose properties include radio and interactive platforms.
column4: Kao direktorica društva Midway Broadcasting došla je na elitni popis žena vlasnica medija nakon što je 1999. kupila većinski udio dionica tog društva. Društvo Midway Broadcasting najbolje je u kategoriji ženskih i obiteljskih malih medijskih kuća, a u njegovu su vlasništvu radijske stanice i interaktivne platforme.

column3: The book was co-written with T. Shawn Taylor, journalist, writer and founder of Tree Top Consulting, a full-service media consulting firm.
column4: Koautorica je knjige T. Shawn Taylor, novinarka, spisateljica i osnivačica poduzeća za usluge savjetovanja medija Treetop Consulting.

column3: The House voted Friday to block the national emergency declaration President Donald Trump is using to fund his proposed border wall.
column4: ﻿Zastupnički dom u petak je glasovao za blokiranje proglašenja izvanrednog stanja kojim se predsjednik Donald Trump koristi za financiranje predloženog zida na granici.

column3: The Democratic-held chamber passed a resolution to terminate Trump's action by a 236-174 margin, sending it to the president. Eleven Republicans and one independent supported it. The Senate already approved the measure in a 54-41 vote, as 11 Republicans joined Democrats in backing it.
column4: Dom s demokratskom većinom usvojio je rezoluciju o okončanju Trumpovog postupka s 236 naprama 174 glasova i poslao je predsjedniku. Rezoluciju je podržalo 11 republikanaca i jedan nezavisni zastupnik. Senat je već odobrio tu mjeru s 54 naprama 41 glasa nakon što se 11 republikanaca priključilo demokratima i podržalo rezoluciju.

column3: Trump will likely veto the resolution, the sixth time he will have blocked congressional legislation as president. He already vetoed a measure to end the emergency declaration in March.
column4: Trump će vjerojatno staviti veto na rezoluciju, i to će biti šesti put da će blokirati kongresne zakone kao predsjednik. Već je stavio veto na mjeru za okončanje proglašenja izvanrednog stanja u ožujku.

column3: Neither chamber of Congress appears to have the two-thirds majority needed to override the president's opposition.
column4: Izgleda da ni jedan dom u Kongresu nema dvotrećinsku većinu potrebnu za nadglasavanje predsjednikove oporbe.

column3: Failing to get the funding he desired for borders on the southern border from both the Mexican government and Congress, Trump declared the national emergency in February. His administration plans to pull $3.6 billion from military construction to fund border projects.
column4: Nakon što ni od meksičke vlade ni od Kongresa nije dobio željena sredstva za izgradnju zida na južnoj granici, Trump je proglasio izvanredno stanje u veljači. Njegova administracija planira povući 3,6 milijardi dolara iz vojnih građevinskih sredstava za financiranje graničnih projekata.

column3: Democrats have accused Trump of both circumventing Congress' power of the purse and raiding key Defense funds for unnecessary barriers. A handful of Republicans in both the House and Senate also had concerns about the precedent Trump's declaration would set for executive overreach in the future.
column4: Demokrati su optužili Trumpa za zaobilaženje kongresnih ovlasti upravljanja financijskim sredstvima i povlačenje novca iz ključnih obrambenih fondova u svrhu izgradnje nepotrebnih barijera. Šačica republikanaca u Domu i Senatu također je bila zabrinuta zbog presedana koji bi Trumpovo proglašenje izvanrednog stanja u budućnosti moglo postaviti za zloupotrebu izvršnih ovlasti.

column3: Some Senate Republicans facing elections next year have faced sharp political pressure over the national emergency vote.
column4: Neki senatski republikanci koji će se kandidirati na izborima sljedeće godine suočili su se s jakim političkim pritiskom zbog glasovanja o izvanrednom stanju.

column3: North Korea says nuclear disarmament won't come unless it can trust US
column4: ﻿Sjeverna Koreja kaže da neće biti nuklearnog razoružanja ako ne može vjerovati SAD-u

column3: North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho says his nation will never disarm its nuclear weapons first if it can't trust Washington.
column4: Ministar vanjskih poslova Sjeverne Koreje Ri Yong Ho tvrdi da njegova zemlja nikada neće prva započeti s nuklearnim razoružanjem ako ne može vjerovati Washingtonu.

column3: Ri was speaking Saturday at the United Nations General Assembly.
column4: Ri je u subotu govorio na Općoj skupštini Ujedinjenih naroda.

column3: He called on the United States to follow through on promises made during a summit in Singapore between the rivals' leaders.
column4: Pozvao je SAD da ispuni obećanja donesena na sastanku čelnika te dvije zemlje suparnice u Singapuru.

column3: His comments come as US. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo seems to be on the verge of restarting deadlocked nuclear diplomacy more than three months after the Singapore with North Korea's Kim Jong Un.
column4: Ti komentari uslijedili su više od tri mjeseca nakon sastanka sa sjevernokorejskim vođom Kim Jong Unom u Singapuru, u trenutku u kojem je američki državni tajnik Mike Pompeo na rubu ponovnog pomicanja nuklearne diplomacije iz mrtve točke.

column3: Ri says it's a "pipe dream" that continued sanctions and U.S. objection to a declaration ending the Korean War will ever bring the North to its knees.
column4: Ri kaže da je pretpostavka da će nastavak sankcija i prigovor SAD-a na proglašenje završetka Korejskog rata baciti Sjevernu Koreju na koljena „samo fantazija”.

column3: Washington is wary of agreeing to the declaration without Pyongyang first making significant disarmament moves.
column4: Washington je nepovjerljiv prema proglašenju prije nego što Pyongyang poduzme znatne korake u razoružanju.

column3: Both Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump want a second summit.
column4: I Kim i američki predsjednik Donald Trump žele održati još jedan sastanak.

column3: But there is widespread skepticism that Pyongyang is serious about renouncing an arsenal that the country likely sees as the only way to guarantee its safety.
column4: Međutim, široko je prisutna sumnja oko toga hoće li se Pyongyang doista odreći arsenala koji vjerojatno smatra jedinim načinom osiguranja vlastite sigurnosti.

column3: Pompeo is planning to visit Pyongyang next month to prepare for a second Kim-Trump summit.
column4: Pompeo namjerava posjetiti Pyongyang sljedeći mjesec radi pripreme sljedećeg sastanka državnih čelnika Kima i Trumpa.

column3: Outside money floods into tightest midterm election House races
column4: ﻿Veliki priljev novca izvana u najneizvjesnijoj kongresnoj izbornoj utrci u SAD-u

column3: It's not surprising that Pennsylvania's 17th is seeing a flood of cash, thanks to a realignment of a congressional districts that landed two incumbents in a race for the same seat.
column4: Ne iznenađuje činjenica da pensilvanijski 17. kongresni okrug doživljava veliki priljev novca zahvaljujući preustroju kongresnih okruga zbog kojeg su dva mandatara u utrci završila na istom mjestu.

column3: This recently redrawn suburban Pittsburg district pits Democrat Rep. Conor Lamb - who won his seat in another district in a special election last spring.
column4: Nedavno uspostavljeni izborni okrug u predgrađu Pittsburga dovodi u sukob demokratskog zastupnika Conora Lamba, koji je osvojio svoje mjesto u drugom okrugu u posebnim izborima prošlog proljeća.

column3: Lamb is running against another incumbent, Republican Keith Rothfus, who currently represents the old Pennsylvania 12th district, which overlaps heavily with the new 17th.
column4: Lamb se kandidira protiv drugog mandatara, republikanca Keitha Rothfusa, koji trenutačno zastupa stari pensilvanijski 12. okrug, koji se preklapa s novim 17. okrugom.

column3: The maps were redrawn after the Pennsylvania Supreme Court ruled in January that the old districts were unconstitutionally gerrymandered in Republicans' favor.
column4: Granice su se promijenile nakon što je pensilvanijski vrhovni sud u siječnju donio odluku da su stari izborni okruzi neustavno „skrojeni” u korist Republikanske stranke.

column3: The race in the new 17th has touched off a campaign finance slugfest between the major party finance arms, the Democratic Campaign Congressional Committee (DCCC) and the National Republican Campaign Committee (NRCC).
column4: Utrka u novom 17. izbornom okrugu dovela je do borbe u financiranju kampanja između dviju velikih tijela za financiranje stranaka, Demokratskog odbora za kongresne kampanje (Democratic Campaign Congressional Committee, DCC) i Nacionalnog republikanskog odbora za kampanje (National Republican Campaign Committee, NRCC).

column3: Lamb became a familiar name in Pennsylvania after a narrow win in a widely watched in March special election for Pennsylvania's 18th Congressional District.
column4: Lamb je postao poznato ime u Pennsylvaniji nakon tijesne pobjede u naširoko praćenim posebnim izborima za pensilvanijski 18. kongresni okrug u ožujku.

column3: That seat had been held by a Republican for over a decade, and President Donald Trump won the district by 20 points.
column4: Na tom je mjestu duže od deset godina bio republikanac, a predsjednik Donald Trump pobijedio je u tom okrugu s prednošću od 20 bodova.

column3: Political pundits have given Democrats a slight edge.
column4: Politički stručnjaci daju demokratima malu prednost.

column3: Red Tide Update: Concentrations decrease in Pinellas, Manatee and Sarasota
column4: ﻿Novosti o cvjetanju mora: smanjuju se koncentracije u okruzima Pinellas, Manatee i Sarasota

column3: The newest report from the Florida Fish and Wildlife Commission shows a general decrease in Red Tide concentrations for parts of the Tampa Bay area.
column4: Najnovije izvješće Povjerenstva za ribu i divlju faunu i floru savezne države Florida (FWC) ukazuje na opće smanjenje koncentracija mikroorganizama u dijelovima područja zaljeva Tampa Bay.

column3: According to the FWC, patchier bloom conditions are being reported in areas of Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte and Collier counties - which suggests decreasing concentrations.
column4: Prema FWC-u nejednake površine cvjetanja mora prijavljene su na području okruga Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte i Collier, što ukazuje na smanjenje koncentracija.

column3: A bloom the Red Tide extends approximately 130 miles of coastline from northern Pinellas to southern Lee counties.
column4: Zahvaćene površine protežu se na oko 210 kilometara obalnog područja od okruga Pinellas na sjeveru do okruga Lee na jugu.

column3: Patches can be found about 10 miles offshore of Hillsborough County, but at fewer sites relative to last week.
column4: Površine zahvaćene cvjetanjem mora mogu se pronaći i 16 kilometara od obale u okrugu Hillsborough, ali na manje mjesta u odnosu na prošli tjedan.

column3: Red Tide has also been observed in Pasco County.
column4: Cvjetanje mora primijećeno je i u okrugu Pasco.

column3: Medium concentrations in or offshore of Pinellas County have been reported in the past week, low to high concentrations offshore of Hillsborough County, background to high concentrations in Manatee County, background to high concentrations in or offshore of Sarasota County, background to medium concentrations in Charlotte County, background to high concentrations in or offshore of Lee County, and low concentrations in Collier County.
column4: Prošli tjedan prijavljene su umjerene koncentracije u priobalnom ili odobalnom području okruga Pinellas, niske do visoke koncentracije u odobalnom području okruga Hillsborough, pozadinske do visoke koncentracije u okrugu Manatee, pozadinske do visoke koncentracije u priobalnom ili odobalnom području okruga Sarasota, pozadinske do umjerene koncentracije u okrugu Charlotte, pozadinske do visoke koncentracije u priobalnom ili odobalnom području okruga Lee te niske koncentracije u okrugu Collier.

column3: Respiratory irritation continues to be reported in Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Lee, and Collier counties.
column4: Slučajevi nadraženosti dišnog sustava i dalje se prijavljuju u okruzima Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Lee i Collier.

column3: Respiratory irritation was not reported in Northwest Florida over the past week.
column4: Prošlog tjedna nisu prijavljeni slučajevi nadraženosti dišnog sustava u sjeverozapadnoj Floridi.

column3: <!-- error parsing file '/home/katja/saar/vartra/eamt-maja/news/selection/en/cnn.304400' -->

column3: Thieves take $26,750 during ATM refill at Newport on the Levee
column4: ﻿Lopovi ukrali 26.750 dolara za vrijeme punjenja bankomata u centru Newport on the Levee

column3: Thieves on Friday morning stole $26,750 from a Brink's worker refilling an ATM at Newport on the Levee, according to a news release from the Newport Police Department.
column4: Lopovi su u petak ujutro ukrali 26.750 dolara od zaposlenika tvrtke Brinks koji je punio bankomat u centru Newport on the Levee, navodi se u vijestima iz policijske postaje u Newportu.

column3: The car's driver had been emptying an ATM in the entertainment complex and preparing to deliver more money, Det. Dennis McCarthy wrote in the release.
column4: Vozač automobila praznio je bankomat u centru sa zabavnim sadržajima i pripremao se napuniti bankomat novcem, navodi detektiv Dennis McCarthy u svojoj izjavi.

column3: While he was occupied, another man "ran up from behind the Brink's employee" and stole a bag of money meant for delivery.
column4: Dok je bio zauzet, drugi je čovjek „odostraga dotrčao do zaposlenika tvrtke Brinks” i ukrao vreću novca namijenjenu punjenju bankomata.

column3: Witnesses spotted multiple suspects fleeing the scene, according to the release, but police did not specify the number involved in the incident.
column4: Prema priopćenju, svjedoci su primijetili kako više osumnjičenika bježi s mjesta zločina, ali policija nije precizirala broj osoba koje su sudjelovale u incidentu.

column3: Anyone with information about their identities should contact Newport police at 859-292-3680.
column4: Svi koji imaju informacije o identitetu osumnjičenika upućuju se da nazovu policijsku postaju u Newportu na broj 859-292-3680.

column3: Trump rallies in West Virginia
column4: ﻿Skupovi Trumpovih pristaša u West Virginiji

column3: The President obliquely referred to the situation surrounding his Supreme Court pick Brett Kavanaugh while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.
column4: Predsjednik Trump neizravno je komentirao situaciju oko svojeg odabira Bretta Kavanaugha kao kandidata za Vrhovni sud u govoru o važnosti izlaska republikanaca na predstojeće izbore.

column3:
All of what we've done is at stake in November.	„Sve što smo postigli u pitanju je u studenom.
cnn.304447	pr04	Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.	Pet tjedana od jednih od najvažnijih izbora u našim životima.
cnn.304447	pr04	This is one of the big, big -- I'm not running but I'm really running that's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates, he said.
column4: To je jedan od velikih, velikih – ja nisam kandidat, ali se zapravo natječem i zato ulažem velike napore u promicanje odličnih kandidata”, rekao je Trump.

column3: Trump continued, "You see this horrible, horrible radical group of Democrats, you see it happening right now.
column4: Nastavio je: „Vidite tu groznu, groznu radikalnu skupinu demokrata, vidite da se to sada događa.

column3: And they're determined to take back power by using any means necessary, you see the meanness, the nastiness.
column4: Odlučni su u tome da se vrate na vlast koristeći se svim raspoloživim sredstvima, vidite tu podlost, zlobnost.

column3: They don't care who they hurt, who they have to run over in order to get power and control, that's what they want is power and control, we're not going to give it to them."
column4: Nije ih briga koga će povrijediti, koga će pregaziti kako bi dobili vlast i kontrolu, to je ono što žele, vlast i kontrola, ali nećemo im to dopustiti.”

column3: Democrats, he said, are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."
column4: Izjavio je da je misija Demokrata „opiranje i ometanje”.

column3: And you see that over the last four days, he said, calling the Democrats "angry and mean and nasty and untruthful."
column4: „I to je očito u prošla četiri dana”, rekao je, nazivajući Demokrate „ljutima i zlobnima i podlima i lažljivima”.

column3: He referenced Senate Judiciary Committee ranking Democratic Sen. Dianne Feinstein by name, which received loud boos from the audience.
column4: Imenom je spomenuo visokopozicioniranu senatoricu Odbora za pravosuđe u Senatu Dianne Feinstein, nakon čega je publika počela glasno zviždati.

column3:
Remember her answer?	„Sjećate se njezina odgovora?
