column3: Another Fake MAC on here, dont buy!
column4: ﻿Još jedan lažni MAC proizvod, ne kupujte!

column3: Why should you care?
column4: Zašto bi vas bilo briga?

column3: Sales of fake MAC pigments are widespread across the Internet, so people often assume they must be safe or even identical to genuine MAC products.
column4: Prodaja lažnih MAC pigmenata raširena je diljem interneta, pa ljudi često pretpostavljaju da su ti proizvodi sigurni ili čak identični originalnim MAC proizvodima.

column3: Unfortunately, that is not the case.
column4: To nažalost nije tako.

column3: Fake MAC pigments have been analyzed to contain chemical irritants, bacterial contamination (including in at least one case e. coli) or even toxins like lead and carcinogens.
column4: Analizom lažnih MAC pigmenata utvrđeno je da sadrže kemijske iritanse, bakterijske kontaminante (uključujući u barem jednom slučaju e. coli) ili čak toksine poput olova i kancerogene tvari.

column3: Do you really want to risk blindness or permanent facial scarring just to get a deal?
column4: Želite li stvarno riskirati sljepoću ili trajne ožiljke na licu samo da biste uštedjeli?

column3: Dated but Valuable Reading
column4: ﻿Staro, ali vrijedno čitanja

column3: It is amazing that this book is nearly 15 years old, and further that Bill Gates was so spot on with the current technology that we see today.
column4: Zapanjujuće je da je ova knjiga stara gotovo 15 godina i da je Bill Gates bio tako precizan u predviđanjima tehnologije kojoj danas svjedočimo.

column3: It is a good read to see both the vision of this truly amazing entrepreneur, as well as to get an idea of how to think about technology enabling daily life.
column4: Vrijedi pročitati kako biste naučili više o viziji ovog zaista sjajnog poduzetnika, kao i da biste saznali kako promišljati o tehnologiji koja omogućava svakodnevni život.

column3: Listen to what Bill gates says about the future of technology in your life - the past would indicate he knows what he's talking about.
column4: Poslušajte što Bill Gates govori o budućnosti tehnologije u vašim životima – prošlost pokazuje da zna o čemu govori.

column3: Logical follow-up to Tailchaser's Song
column4: ﻿Logičan nastavak knjige „Tailchaser's Song”

column3: This work bears deep connections to themes first explored in Tad Williams' original breakout novel, about a brave young cat who travels to an underground netherworld to face an ancient evil.
column4: Ovo djelo ima duboke poveznice s temama koje je Tad Williams prvotno istražio u svojem prvijencu kojim se probio, a koji govori o hrabrom mladom mačku koji putuje u podzemni zagrobni svijet kako bi se suočio s drevnim zlom.

column3: As the owner of two cats myself, after the second read-through, I realized that this novel has much to teach about the critical importance of dealing with fur and dust.I could only give four stars, though, because the cats do not agree, and indeed wish I had not made this purchase.
column4: Kao vlasnik dviju mačaka nakon drugog čitanja shvaćam da nas ovaj roman može mnogo naučiti o ključnoj važnosti nošenja s krznom i prašinom. Ipak mu dajem samo četiri zvjezdice jer se mačke ne slažu i voljele bi da nisam kupio ovaj roman.

column3: In the land of the blind...
column4: ﻿U zemlji slijepih...

column3: This piece of literature promises enlightenment but fails to deliver.
column4: Ova knjiga obećava prosvjetljenje, ali ne uspijeva ispuniti to obećanje.

column3: Though the transient prophet indeed speaks eloquently and his words inspire deep reflection, they fail to impart true understanding.
column4: Iako prolazni prorok uistinu lijepo govori i njegove riječi potiču na dubinsku samorefleksiju, ne uspijevaju prenijeti istinsko razumijevanje.

column3: The initial discourse on love is riveting but what follows quickly descends into empty rhetorical musings which continue until the bitter end.

column3: My luck wasn't good.

column3: The hose had permanent kinks and the vinyl skin had bubbles where it was separating from the hose.Returned it immediately.
column4: Crijevo je imalo trajna oštećenja od savijanja, a vinilni je sloj imao mjehuriće na mjestima gdje se odvajao od crijeva. Odmah sam ga vratio.

column3: Useless trap, horrible design

column3: The coons steal the bait from this trap at will.

column4: Savjetuju da mamac stavite iza ploče, ali rakuni samo posegnu kroz mrežicu i uzmu mamac, što je još jedna ozbiljna pogreška u dizajnu.

column3: There are traps that work, this just in NOT one of those.
column4: Postoje zamke koje djeluju, ali ova NIJE jedna od njih.

column3: Save your money!

column3: Two different ones broke
column4: ﻿Dva različita su se slomila

column3: The pruner will not release easily if you grab hold of a branch a little too thick, and at five feet away it's not always the easiest thing to do to notice if that branch is an 1/8th inch too thick.
column4: Sjekač se neće lako otpustiti ako pokušate odrezati granu koja je malo predebela, a na udaljenosti od metar i pol nije uvijek lako primijetiti da je grana 3 milimetra predebela.

column3: As a result, it broke on the second day.
column4: Zbog toga se slomio već drugi dan.

column3: Amazon replaced with another, which broke due to same issue, but this time was too late to return.
column4: Amazon ga je zamijenio drugim, koji se slomio zbog istog razloga, ali je bilo prekasno za povrat.

column3: I bought another, more expensive one that I am happy with and I would recommend it to anyone else: ARS LA-180ZR203 4-to-7-Feet Long Reach Pruner
column4: Kupio sam drugi, skuplji s kojim sam zadovoljan i preporučio bih ga svakome: ARS LA-180ZR203 teleskopski sjekač duljine od 1,2 do 2,1 metra

column3: Not for bushes

column3: GGGGGGGGREAT

column3: DVD for Cats

column3: Purchased this cat DVD for our active cat.

column3: Hoping that it would keep his attention long enough to give me a break from playing with him.
column4: Nadala sam da će ga zaokupiti dovoljno da se mogu odmoriti od igre s njim.

column3: The other DVD's he doesn't even look at.
column4: Druge DVD-ove ne želi ni pogledati.

column3: Maybe I just have a cat that is just too active to sit still...I don't know.

column3: Unfortunately, I saw it too late.
column4: Nažalost, to sam prekasno primijetio.

column3: My bad.
column4: Pogriješio sam.

column3: But where's the logic ?Then my cats didn't like those DVDs.

column3: ?I was more entertained by those DVDs than my cats.

column3: Waste of $
column4: ﻿Bačen novac

column3: If you want your bird to interact with you, then interact with your bird.
column4: Ako želite da vaša ptica komunicira s vama, komunicirajte vi s njom.

column3: Parrots have the mental capacity of a 3-5 year old child.
column4: Papige imaju mentalne sposobnosti djeteta starog između 3 i 5 godina.

column3: This is like plopping your child down in front of the TV and calling it quality time.
column4: Ovo je kao da posjednete dijete pred TV i smatrate to kvalitetno provedenim vremenom.

column3: Parrots learn to communicate dynamically not by rote.
column4: Papige uče komunicirati dinamično, a ne štrebajući.

column3: I have 5 parrots and all are chatty because we chat, while cleaning, cooking, doing laundry.. whatever.
column4: Imam pet papiga i sve su razgovorljive jer pričamo dok čistim, kuham, perem rublje... Bilo što.

column3: Turn off the TV and read aloud, talk, sing, dance.. be one of the flock.
column4: Isključite TV i čitajte naglas, pričajte, pjevajte, plešite... Budite dio jata.

column3: Feathered Phonics volume 1
column4: ﻿Feathered Phonics, prvi dio

column3: The CD is a good idea for teaching a bird to speak,but there are words on it that would never be spoken in our home so why teach them to the bird.
column4: Ovaj je CD dobra ideja za učenje ptice da govori, ali sadrži neke riječi koje nikad ne bismo govorili u našem domu, pa ih nema smisla učiti pticu.

column3: I will look through the other choices of CD's and try to find one with different words.
column4: Pregledat ću ponudu drugih CD-ova i pokušati pronaći neki s drugačijim riječima.

column3: Waste of Money
column4: ﻿Bačeni novac

column3: This is the biggest waste of money - do not buy it - it will not work!It's just people saying a certain word, then a 10 second pause ... then a different word and another 10 second pause.
column4: Ovo je uzalud bačeni novac – nemojte kupovati – neće imati učinka! To su samo ljudi koji izgovore neku riječ, onda 10 sekundi stanke... Pa onda druga riječ i novih 10 sekundi stanke.

column3: You can create your own if you really want to try this.But you really should not leave this on for your bird all day - it should be done in 10 minute intervals only or your bird may get irritated by it (i know i get irritated by it after only 2 words).Don't waste your money on this.
column4: Možete to napraviti i sami ako zaista želite ovo isprobati. Ali nikako nemojte ostavljati uključeno svojoj ptici cijeli dan – uključite na najviše 10 minuta ili će je razdražiti (znam da sam ja postao razdražen već nakon dvije riječi). Ne bacajte novac na ovo.

column3: Macedonians go to polls in referendum on changing country's name
column4: ﻿Makedonci izlaze na biračka mjesta u referendumu o promjeni imena države

column3: Voters will vote Sunday on whether to change their country's name to the "Republic of North Macedonia."
column4: Birači će u nedjelju odlučivati o tome hoće li se ime njihove države promijeniti u „Republika Sjeverna Makedonija”.

column3: The popular vote was set up in a bid to resolve a decades-long dispute with neighboring Greece, which has its own province called Macedonia.
column4: Referendum je organiziran kako bi se razriješio desetljećima dug spor sa susjednom Grčkom, koja ima regiju nazvanu Makedonija.

column3: Athens has long insisted that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has repeatedly objected to its membership bids for the EU and NATO.
column4: Atena je dugo naglašavala da ime sjevernog susjeda predstavlja posezanje za grčkim teritorijem i više se puta usprotivila makedonskim prijavama za članstvo u EU-u i NATO savezu.

column3: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov, an opponent of the plebiscite on the name change, has said he will disregard the vote.
column4: Makedonski predsjednik Gjorgje Ivanov, protivnik plebiscita o promjeni imena, rekao je da će ignorirati rezultate glasovanja.

column3: However, supporters of the referendum, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that the name change is simply the price to pay to join the EU and NATO.
column4: Međutim, pristaše referenduma, uključujući premijera Zorana Zaeva, ističu da je promjena imena cijena koja se mora platiti za ulazak u EU i NATO savez.

column3: Eilidh Doyle will be "voice for athletes" on Scottish Athletics board
column4: ﻿Eilidh Doyle bit će „glas atletičara” u upravi Škotskog atletskog saveza

column3: Eilidh Doyle has been elected to the board of Scottish Athletics as a non-executive director at the governing body's annual general meeting.
column4: Eilidh Doyle izabrana je kao savjetodavni član uprave Škotskog atletskog saveza na godišnjoj glavnoj skupštini tog državnog tijela.

column3: Doyle is Scotland's most decorated track and field athlete and chairman Ian Beattie described the move as a great opportunity for those guiding the sport to benefit from her wide-ranging experience at international level over the past decade.
column4: Doyle je najnagrađivanija škotska atletičarka i predsjednik uprave Ian Beattie opisao je taj potez kao odličnu priliku da ljudi koji određuju smjer sporta iskoriste njezino opsežno iskustvo na međunarodnoj razini koje je stekla tijekom prošlog desetljeća.

column3: Eilidh has massive respect across the Scottish, UK and world athletics community and we are sure athletics in Scotland would benefit hugely by bringing her on to the board, Beattie said.
column4: „Škotska, britanska i svjetska zajednica atletičara ima neizmjerno poštovanje za Eilidh i sigurni smo da bi njezina prisutnost u upravi bila od velike koristi za atletiku u Škotskoj”, rekao je Beattie.

column3: Doyle said: "I am keen to act as a voice for athletes and I am hoping I can really contribute and help guide the sport in Scotland."
column4: Doyle je izjavila: „Radujem se tome da budem glas atletičara i nadam se da ću doista moći doprinijeti sportu u Škotskoj i pomoći u njegovu usmjeravanju.”

column3: The American, who won the 200 metres and 400 metres at the 1996 Games in Atlanta among his total of four Olympic golds and is now a regular BBC pundit, was left unable to walk after suffering a transient ischemic attack.
column4: Amerikanac koji je pobijedio u utrkama na 200 i 400 metara na Olimpijskim igrama u Atlanti 1996., što su dva od ukupno četiri olimpijska zlata koja je osvojio, i koji je sada običan BBC-jev stručnjak, više ne može hodati nakon ishemijskog moždanog udara.

column3: He wrote on Twitter: "A month ago today I suffered a stroke.
column4: Na Twitteru je napisao: „Prije mjesec dana sam doživio moždani udar.

column3: I could not walk.
column4: Nisam mogao hodati.

column3: Doctors said only time will tell if I will recover or to what degree.
column4: Doktori su rekli da će samo vrijeme pokazati hoću li se oporaviti i u kojoj mjeri.

column3: Its been grueling work but made a full recovery, re-learned how to walk and today doing agility drills!
column4: Bilo je naporno, ali potpuno sam se oporavio, ponovno sam naučio hodati i danas radim na agilnosti!

column3: Thanks for the messages of encouragement!"
column4: Hvala na porukama potpore!”

column3: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Unbeaten Ayr go top
column4: ﻿Ayr 38 – 17 Melrose: nepobijeđeni Ayr na putu prema vrhu

column3: Two late tries may have skewed the final result somewhat, but there is no doubt Ayr deserved to triumph in this wonderfully-entertaining Tennent's Premiership match of the day.
column4: Dva kasna zgoditka možda su pomalo iskrivila konačni rezultat, ali Ayr je bez sumnje zaslužio pobjedu u ovoj vrlo zabavnoj utakmici dana lige Tennent's Premiership.

column3: They now top the table, the only unbeaten side of the ten.
column4: Sada su na vrhu ljestvice, jedini nepobijeđeni tim od njih deset.

column3: In the end, it was their superior defence, as much as their better chance-taking, which carried the home side and coach Peter Murchie had every right to be pleased.
column4: Domaćini su pobijedili zahvaljujući svojoj boljoj obrani i bolje iskorištenim prilikama, a trener Peter Murchie imao je zbog čega biti zadovoljan.

column3: We've been tested over our games this far, and we're still unbeaten, so I have to be happy, he said.
column4: „Testirali su nas tijekom proteklih utakmica, a i dalje smo nepobijeđeni, tako da moram biti sretan”, rekao je.

column3: Robyn Christie of Melrose said: "Credit to Ayr, they took their chances better than we did."
column4: Melroseov Robyn Christie izjavio je: „Čestitke Ayru, bolje su iskoristili prilike nego mi.”

column3: Grant Anderson's 14th minute try, converted by Frazier Climo, put Ayr in front, but, a yellow card for Scotland cap Rory Hughes, released for the game by Warriors, allowed Melrose to make numbers tell and Jason Baggot grabbed an unconverted try.
column4: Zgoditak Granta Andersona u 14. minuti, koji je pretvorio Frazier Climo, doveo je Ayr u vodstvo, ali žuti karton za škotskog kapetana Roryja Hughesa, kojeg su za utakmicu posudili Warriorsi, omogućio je Melroseu da iskoristi situaciju i Jason Baggot uspješno je postignuo nepretvoreni zgoditak.

column3: Climo stretched the Ayr lead with a penalty, before, right on half-time, he scored then converted a solo try to make it 17-5 to Ayr at the break.
column4: Climo je produljio vodstvo Ayra kaznom prije nego što je netom prije poluvremena osvojio bod i zatim pretvorio samostalni zgoditak, tako da je Ayr u poluvremenu bio u vodstvu 17-5.

column3: But Melrose began the second half well and Patrick Anderson's try, converted by Baggot, reduced the leeway to five points.
column4: No Melrose je dobro započeo drugo poluvrijeme i zgoditak Patricka Andersona, koji je pretvorio Baggot, smanjio je razliku na pet bodova.

column3: There was then a lengthy hold-up for a serious injury to Ruaridh Knott, who was stretchered off, and from the restart, Ayr surged further ahead through a Stafford McDowall try, converted by Climo.
column4: Uslijedila je duga pauza zbog ozbiljne ozljede Ruaridha Knotta, koji je odnesen na nosilima, i nakon što je igra nastavila, Ayr je ponovno povećao svoje vodstvo zgoditkom Stafforda McDowalla, koji je pretvorio Climo.

column3: Ayr acting captain Blair Macpherson was then yellow-carded, and again, Melrose made the extra man pay with an unconverted Bruce Colvine try, at the end of a spell of fierce pressure.
column4: Ayrov privremeni kapetan Blair Macpherson zatim je dobio žuti karton i Melroseu je ponovno krenulo uz nepretvoreni zgoditak Brucea Colvinea nakon dugog neprekinutog pritiska.

column3: The home side came back, however, and when Struan Hutchinson was yellow-carded for tackling Climo without the ball, from the penalty line-out, MacPherson touched down at the back of the advancing Ayr maul.
column4: Međutim, domaćini su ponovno preuzeli vodstvo i MacPherson je iz auta postignuo polaganje iza nadolazećeg Ayrova mlina nakon što je Struan Hutchinson dobio žuti karton za obaranje Climoa bez lopte.

column3: Climo converted, as he did again almost from the restart, after Kyle Rowe gathered David Armstrong's box kick and sent flanker Gregor Henry away for the home side's fifth try.
column4: Climo je pretvorio, kao što je to učinio gotovo odmah nakon nastavka utakmice, nakon što je Kyle Rowe uhvatio nožni udarac Davida Armstronga i izbacio krilo skupa Gregora Henrya za zgoditak domaćina.

column3: Health secretary writes to EU workers at NHS Scotland over Brexit fears
column4: ﻿Britanska tajnica za zdravstvo pisala državljanima EU-a koji rade u NHS-u u vezi strahova zbog posljedica Brexita

column3: The Health Secretary has written to EU staff working in Scotland's NHS to express the country's gratitude and wish for them to stay on post-Brexit.
column4: Britanska tajnica za zdravstvo pisala je osoblju koje radi u sustavu škotske Nacionalne zdravstvene službe (NHS), a dolazi iz zemalja Europske unije, da bi izrazila zahvalnost zemlje i poželjela članovima da ostanu i nakon Brexita.

column3: Jeane Freeman MSP sent a letter with less than six months to go until the UK withdraws from the EU.
column4: Jeanne Freeman poslala je pismo manje od šest mjeseci prije povlačenja Velike Britanije iz Europske Unije.

column3: The Scottish Government has already committed to meet the cost of settled status applications for EU citizens working in its devolved public services.
column4: Škotska vlada već se obvezala na podmirivanje troška prijava za uređen status građana Unije koji rade u njezinim decentraliziranim javnim službama.

column3: In her letter, Ms Freeman wrote: "Over the summer, negotiations between the UK and EU on withdrawal have continued, heading towards expected decisions this autumn.
column4: U svojem pismu Freeman je napisala sljedeće: „Tijekom ljeta pregovori o povlačenju između Ujedinjene Kraljevine i Europske unije išli su dalje i kreću se prema odlukama koje očekujemo ove jeseni.

column3: But the UK Government has also been stepping up its preparations for a possible no-deal scenario.
column4: No vlada Ujedinjene Kraljevine također je intenzivirala pripreme za mogući scenarij Brexita bez dogovora.

column3: I know this must be a very unsettling time for all of you.
column4: Znam da je to sigurno svima vama veoma uznemirujuće.

column3: That is why I wanted to reiterate now how much I value the contribution of every member of staff, regardless of their nationality.
column4: Stoga sam htjela ponoviti koliko cijenim doprinos svakog člana osoblja, bez obzira na njegovo državljanstvo.

column3: Colleagues from across the EU, and beyond, bring valuable experience and skills that strengthen and improve the work of the health service, and benefit the patients and communities we serve.
column4: Kolege koje su došle iz Europske unije i šire donose dragocjeno iskustvo i vještine koje jačaju i poboljšavaju rad zdravstvene službe te pružaju doprinos pacijentima i zajednicama kojima služimo.

column3: Scotland is absolutely your home and we very much want you to stay here."
column4: Škotska je bez sumnje vaš dom i vrlo žarko želimo da ostanete ovdje.”

column3: Rangers' Graham Dorrans optimistic ahead of Rapid Vienna clash
column4: ﻿Graham Dorrans iz Rangersa optimističan prije susreta s bečkim Rapidom

column3: Rangers host Rapid Vienna on Thursday, knowing that victory over the Austrians, following the impressive draw in Spain against Villarreal earlier this month, will put them in a strong position to qualify from Group G of the Europa League.
column4: Rangersi dočekuju bečki Rapid u četvrtak svjesni da bi ih pobjeda nad Austrijancima, nakon impresivnog remija u Španjolskoj protiv Villarreala ranije ovog mjeseca, dovela u sjajnu poziciju da se kvalificiraju u nastavak natjecanja iz Grupe G Europske lige.

column3: A knee injury prevented midfielder Graham Dorrans from making his first appearance of the season until the 2-2 draw with Villarreal but he believes Rangers can use that result as a springboard to greater things.
column4: Zbog ozljede koljena veznjak Graham Dorrans imao je prvi nastup sezone tek u remiju 2 : 2 s Villarrealom, no uvjeren je da Rangersima taj rezultat može biti odskočna daska za veće uspjehe.

column3: It was a good point for us because Villarreal are a good side, said the 31-year-old.
column4: „Ovaj nam je bod vrijedan jer je Villarreal dobra ekipa”, rekao je 31-godišnjak.

column3: Still Game star looks set for new career in restaurant industry
column4: ﻿Zvijezda televizijske serije Still Game započinje novu karijeru u restoranskoj industriji

column3: Still Game star Ford Kieran looks set to move into the hospitality industry after it was discovered he's been named as the director of a licensed restaurants company.
column4: Čini se da zvijezda serije Still Game, Ford Kiernan, započinje karijeru u ugostiteljskoj industriji nakon što je otkriveno da je imenovan za direktora licenciranog lanca restorana.

column3: The 56-year-old plays Jack Jarvis on the popular BBC show, which he writes and co-stars with long-time comedy partner Greg Hemphill.
column4: 56-godišnjak glumi Jacka Jarvisa u popularnoj BBC-jevoj emisiji u kojoj je ujedno i scenarist, a s njim glumi i njegov dugogodišnji glumački partner u komedijama, Greg Hemphill.

column3: The duo have announced that the upcoming ninth series will be the final one in the show's run, and it appears Kiernan is planning for life after Craiglang.
column4: Dvojac je objavio da će nadolazeća deveta serija biti posljednja i čini se da Kiernan planira život nakon Craiglanga.

column3: According to official record listings, he is the director of Adriftmorn Limited.
column4: Prema službenim zapisima, on je direktor tvrtke Adriftmorn Limited.

column3: The actor declined to comment on the story, though a Scottish Sun source hinted that Kiernan was looking to get involved in Glasgow's "thriving restaurant trade."
column4: Glumac je odbio komentirati tu priču, iako je izvor za The Scottish Sun dao naslutiti da Kiernan želi sudjelovati u „bogatoj restoranskoj industriji” u Glasgowu.

column3: Nancy Pelosi is subject of book by daughter Christine Pelosi
column4: ﻿Nancy Pelosi tema je knjige svoje kćeri Christine Pelosi

column3: An upcoming book on House Speaker Nancy Pelosi comes from someone who knows her well, daughter Christine Pelosi.
column4: Nova knjiga o predsjednici Zastupničkog doma Sjedinjenih Američkih Država Nancy Pelosi djelo je osobe koja je dobro poznaje, njezine kćeri Christine Pelosi.

column3: The Nancy Pelosi Way will be released Nov. 26, Skyhorse Publishing announced Thursday. Christine Pelosi's book will examine how a mother of five became the first female house speaker and her current leadership of House Democrats during the Trump administration. According to Skyhorse, Christine Pelosi will weave together "the professional and personal experiences" of her mother.
column4: Knjiga „The Nancy Pelosi Way” (Način Nancy Pelosi) bit će objavljena 26. studenog, najavila je izdavačka kuća Skyhorse Publishing u četvrtak. Christine Pelosi u svojoj će knjizi proučavati kako je majka petero djece postala prva žena na mjestu predsjednice Zastupničkog doma te će govoriti o njezinu trenutačnom vodstvu Demokratske stranke tijekom administracije Donalda Trumpa. Iz izdavačke kuće Skyhorse kažu da će Christine Pelosi osvrnuti na „profesionalna i osobna iskustva” svoje majke.

column3: Christine Pelosi is a Democratic Party strategist and author of "Campaign Boot Camp" and "Campaign Boot Camp 2.0." Pelosi's sister, Alexandra Pelosi, is a filmmaker and journalist who has made several documentaries about contemporary politics.
column4: Christine Pelosi strateginja je Demokratske stranke i autorica knjiga „Campaign Boot Camp” (Osnove kampanje) i „Campaign Boot Camp 2.0” (Osnove kampanje 2.0). Pelosina sestra Alexandra Pelosi filmašica je i novinarka te je snimila nekoliko dokumentarnih filmova o suvremenoj politici.

column3: French chemical fire extinguished as questions mount
column4: ﻿Ugašen požar kemikalija u Francuskoj, no ostaju neodgovorena pitanja

column3: French authorities and Normandy residents are clearing up residue from a huge fire at a chemical plant as a foul stench continues to spread over a swath of territory.
column4: Francuska nadležna tijela i stanovnici Normandije čiste ostatke nakon velikog požara u kemijskoj tvornici dok se neugodan smrad i dalje širi velikim područjem.

column3: No one was injured in Thursday's fire at a lubricant plant in Rouen, but residents have expressed concern about possible health risks and consequences for the nearby Seine River.
column4: Nema ozlijeđenih u požaru koji je u četvrtak izbio u tvornici maziva u Rouenu, no stanovnici su zabrinuti zbog mogućih zdravstvenih rizika kao i mogućih posljedica za nedaleku rijeku Seine.

column3: The head of the regional administration said Friday the fire was extinguished Thursday night after nearly 24 hours. Firefighters are still on the scene.
column4: Predsjednik regionalne uprave izjavio je u petak da je vatra ugašena u četvrtak navečer nakon gotovo 24 sata. Vatrogasci su još na terenu.

column3: The administration warned of a new odor released after the fire was put out, saying it could spread to neighboring regions.
column4: Regionalna uprava upozorila je na novi neugodan miris koji je nastao nakon gašenja vatre i poručila da bi se mogao raširiti i na susjedne regije.

column3: Interior Minister Christophe Castaner said people in fragile health should remain indoors through Friday night.
column4: Ministar unutarnjih poslova Christophe Castaner naglasio je da bi ljudi slabijeg zdravlja u petak navečer trebali ostati u zatvorenim prostorima.

column3: The cause of the fire is being investigated. The plant is among the highest-risk industrial sites in Europe.
column4: Uzrok požara još se istražuje. Tvornica u Rouenu spada u najrizičnije industrijske lokacije u Europi.

column3: Man set alight on doorstep 'in targeted attack'
column4: ﻿Čovjek je zapaljen na kućnom pragu u „ciljanom napadu”

column3: A man has been set alight on his doorstep in what police believe is a targeted attack.
column4: Policija vjeruje da je čovjek koji je zapaljen na svom pragu meta ciljanog napada.

column3: The 48-year-old was soaked in flammable liquid, believed to be petrol, before bursting into flames outside his home in Skelmersdale, West Lancashire.
column4: 48-godišnjak je bio natopljen zapaljivom tekućinom, vjerojatno benzinom, prije nego što je zapaljen ispred svoje kuće u Skelmersdaleu u općini West Lancashire.

column3: He is in hospital in a critical but stable condition after suffering serious burns.
column4: Trenutačno se nalazi u bolnici i u kritičnom je, ali stabilnom stanju nakon dobivanja teških opeklina.

column3: Police have launched an attempted murder inquiry after they were called to the man's house at about 1am on Thursday.
column4: Policija je pokrenula istragu o pokušaju ubojstva nakon što su u četvrtak otprilike u 1 ujutro pozvani u kuću tog čovjeka.

column3: Detective Chief Inspector Pauline Stables, leading the investigation, said: "This is a horrific incident which has left a man in a very poorly condition in hospital.
column4: Glavna inspektorica Pauline Stables koja vodi istragu izjavila je: „Ovo je užasan incident i taj je čovjek sada u bolnici u vrlo lošem stanju.

column3:
We are carrying out a number of enquiries to try to identify those responsible.	Provođenjem daljnjih istraga pokušavamo identificirati odgovorne osobe.
sky.com.20669	pr03	While we are trying to establish a motive for what has happened, we do believe that the incident was targeted and I would like to stress that I don't believe there is any threat to the wider community at this time.
column4: Pokušavamo utvrditi motiv tog događaja, ali vjerujemo da je incident bio ciljan i želim naglasiti kako ne vjerujem da postoji bilo kakva prijetnja široj zajednici u ovom trenutku.

column3:
Someone out there knows who has done this and I would urge them to come forward and speak to us.	Netko zna tko je to učinio i ovim ih putem želim pozvati da nam se obrate.
sky.com.20669	pr03	Has a loved one come home acting suspiciously, smelling of smoke or petrol or with unexplained injuries?
column4: Je li se član vaše obitelji vratio kući sumnjivo se ponašajući, mirišući na dim ili benzin ili s neobjašnjivim ozljedama?

column3: We need to find the people responsible for this dreadful crime.
column4: Moramo pronaći osobe odgovorne za ovaj strašan zločin.”

column3: Parliament's statue of Cromwell becomes latest memorial hit by 'rewriting history' row
column4: ﻿Cromwellov kip ispred parlamenta najnovija meta rasprave o „prepravljanju povijesti”

column3: Its banishment would be poetic justice for his Taliban-like destruction of so many of England's cultural and religious artefacts carried out by his fanatical Puritan followers.
column4: Njegovo bi uklanjanje bilo poetska pravda za pravo talibansko uništavanje mnogih engleskih kulturnih i vjerskih artefakata koje su uništili njegovi fanatični puritanski sljedbenici.

column3: But the Cromwell Society described Mr Crick's suggestion as "folly" and "attempting to rewrite history."
column4: Međutim, udruga Cromwell Society opisala je Crickov prijedlog kao „ludost” i „pokušaj prepravljanja povijesti”.

column3: John Goldsmith, chairman of the Cromwell Society, said: "It was inevitable in the present debate about the removal of statues that the figure of Oliver Cromwell outside the Palace of Westminster would become a target.
column4: John Goldsmith, predsjednik udruge Cromwell Society, rekao je: „U okviru trenutačne debate o uklanjanju kipova bilo je neizbježno da će lik Olivera Cromwella ispred Westminsterske palače biti na meti.

column3: The iconoclasm of the English civil wars was neither ordered nor carried out by Cromwell.
column4: Cromwell nije naredio niti provodio ikonoklazam u Engleskom građanskom ratu.

column3: Perhaps the wrong Cromwell would be sacrificed for the actions of his ancestor Thomas in the previous century.
column4: Možda bi krivi Cromwell ispaštao za postupke svojeg pretka Thomasa u prethodnom stoljeću.

column3: Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft's magnificent representation of Cromwell is evidence of 19th century opinion and part of the historiography of a figure who many believe is still worth celebrating.
column4: Veličanstvena reprezentacija Cromwella koju je izradio Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft dokaz je prevladavajućeg mišljenja iz 19. stoljeća i dio je historiografije osobe za koju mnogi i dalje smatraju da je vrijedna veličanja.

column3: Mr Goldsmith told The Sunday Telegraph: "Cromwell is regarded by many, perhaps more in the late 19th century than today, as a defender of parliament against external pressure, in his case of course the monarchy.
column4: Goldsmith je izjavio za The Sunday Telegraph: „Mnogi, možda njih više u kasnom 19. stoljeću nego danas, smatraju da je Cromwell branitelj parlamenta od vanjskog pritiska, što je u ovom slučaju, naravno, monarhija.

column3: Whether that is a wholly accurate representation is the subject of continuing historical debate.
column4: Je li to potpuno točan prikaz predmet je kontinuirane povijesne debate.

column3: What is certain is that the conflict of the mid 17th century has shaped the subsequent development of our nation, and Cromwell is an individual recognisable figure who represents one side of that divide.
column4: No sigurno je da je sukob sredinom 17. stoljeća oblikovao razvoj naše nacije, a Cromwell je prepoznatljivi pojedinac koji predstavlja jednu stranu u tom sukobu.

column3: His achievements as Lord Protector are also worth celebrating and commemorating."
column4: Njegova postignuća kao Lorda zaštitnika također su vrijedna veličanja i spomena.”

column3: How the US-China trade war may be good for Beijing
column4: ﻿Trgovinski rat između Kine i SAD-a mogao bi pogodovati Pekingu

column3: The opening salvos of the trade war between the US and China were deafening, and while the battle is far from over, a rift between the countries may be beneficial to Beijing in the long term, experts say.
column4: Početna paljba u trgovinskom ratu SAD-a i Kine bila je zaglušujuća, a iako bitka nipošto nije završila, jaz između dviju država mogao bi dugoročno pogodovati Pekingu, kažu stručnjaci.

column3: Donald Trump, the US President, fired the first warning earlier this year by taxing key Chinese exports including solar panels, steel and aluminium.
column4: Američki predsjednik Donald Trump ispalio je prvi hitac ranije ove godine, kad je nametnuo porez na ključne kineske izvozne proizvode, poput solarnih ploča, čelika i aluminija.

column3: The most significant escalation rolled in this week with new tariffs affecting $200 billion (£150 billion) worth of items, effectively taxing half of all goods coming into the US from China.
column4: Do najveće eskalacije dovele su ovotjedne nove carinske kvote koje će se primjenjivati na proizvode u vrijednosti od 200 milijardi dolara (1,25 trilijuna kuna) i kojima se oporezuje polovina sve robe koja dolazi u SAD iz Kine.

column3: Beijing has retaliated each time in kind, most recently slapping tariffs of five to ten per cent on $60 billion of American goods.
column4: Peking je svaki put uzvratio istom mjerom te je nedavno nametnuo tarife između pet i deset posto na američku robu u vrijednosti od 60 milijardi dolara (375 milijardi kuna).

column3: China has pledged to match the US shot-for-shot, and the world's second largest economy is unlikely to blink anytime soon.
column4: Kina je obećala da će SAD-u uzvratiti svaku paljbu, a druga najveća gospodarska sila na svijetu najvjerojatnije neće uskoro posustati.

column3: Getting Washington to back down means caving into demands, but publicly bowing to the US would be far too embarrassing for Xi Jinping, China's president.
column4: Da bi Washington popustio, Kina bi trebala pristati na zahtjeve, ali javno pokoravanje SAD-u bilo bi preveliko poniženje za kineskog predsjednika Xija Jinpinga.

column3: Still, experts say if Beijing can play its cards right, US trade war pressures could positively support China over the long term by lowering the inter-dependence of the two economies.
column4: Međutim, stručnjaci kažu da će, ako Peking dobro odigra svoje karte, pritisak trgovinskog rata s SAD-om dugoročno pozitivno utjecati na Kinu jer će se smanjiti međuovisnost dvaju gospodarstava.

column3: The fact that a quick political decision in either Washington or Beijing could create the conditions that start an economic tailspin in either country is actually a lot more dangerous than onlookers have acknowledged before, said Abigail Grace, a research associate who focuses on Asia at the Center for New American Security, a think tank.
column4: „Činjenica da bi ishitrena politička odluka u Washingtonu ili Pekingu mogla stvoriti uvjete koji bi doveli do strmoglavog gospodarskog pada u bilo kojoj od tih država zapravo je mnogo opasnija nego što su promatrači dosad priznavali”, rekla je Abigail Grace, istraživačka suradnica usmjerena na Aziju iz trusta mozgova Centar za novu američku sigurnost (Center for New American Security).

column3: Brett Kavanaugh's future hangs in the balance as FBI begins investigation
column4: ﻿Budućnost Bretta Kavanaugha krajnje upitna nakon početka FBI-eve istrage

column3: I thought, if we could actually get something like what he was asking for - an investigation limited in time, limited in scope - we could maybe bring a little unity, said Mr Flake on Saturday, adding that he feared the committee was "falling apart" amid entrenched partisan gridlock.
column4: „Mislio sam, ako bismo mogli dobiti nešto poput onog što je tražio – vremenski ograničenu istragu ili istragu ograničenog opsega – možda bismo mogli postići malo jedinstva”, izjavio je Flake u subotu i dodao da se boji da se odbor „raspada” zbog ukorijenjene nepopustljivosti stranaka.

column3: Why didn't Mr Kavanaugh and his Republican supporters want the FBI to investigate?
column4: Zašto Kavanaugh i njegove republikanske pristaše ne žele da FBI provede istragu?

column3: Their reluctance is all due to timing.
column4: Uzrok njihovu oklijevanju leži u vremenu.

column3: The midterm elections are only five weeks away, on November 6 - if, as expected, the Republicans do badly, then they will be severely weakened in their attempts to get the man they want elected to the highest court in the land.
column4: Samo je pet tjedana ostalo do općih izbora zakazanih za 6. studenoga, a ako republikanci prema očekivanjima prođu loše, imat će znatno otežane šanse da postave svojeg čovjeka u najviši državni sud.

column3: George W. Bush has been picking up the phone to call Senators, lobbying them to support Mr Kavanaugh, who worked in the White House for Mr Bush and through him met his wife Ashley, who was Mr Bush's personal secretary.
column4: George W. Bush nazivao je senatore i lobirao da podrže Kavanaugha, koji je za njega radio u Bijeloj kući, a ondje je i upoznao svoju suprugu Ashley, nekadašnju Bushevu osobnu tajnicu.

column3: What happens after the FBI produces its report?
column4: Što će se dogoditi nakon što FBI izradi izvješće?

column3: There will be a vote in the Senate, where 51 Republicans and 49 Democrats currently sit.
column4: Glasovat će se u Senatu, u kojem trenutačno sjede 51 republikanac i 49 demokrata.

column3: It's still not clear whether Mr Kavanaugh can get to at least 50 votes on the Senate floor, which would allow Mike Pence, the vice president, to break a tie and confirm him to the Supreme Court.
column4: Još nije jasno može li Kavanaugh dobiti barem 50 glasova u Senatu, što bi omogućilo potpredsjedniku Mikeu Penceu da presudi svojim glasom i potvrdi njegovo imenovanje u Vrhovni sud.

column3: Desperate rescue efforts in Palu as death toll doubles in race to find survivors
column4: ﻿Broj se mrtvih povećava dok traju očajnički pokušaji spašavanja u gradu Palu i utrka za pronalaženjem preživjelih

column3: For survivors, the situation was increasingly dire.
column4: Situacija za preživjele bila je sve gora.

column3: It feels very tense, said 35-year-old mother Risa Kusuma, comforting her feverish baby boy at an evacuation centre in the gutted city of Palu.
column4: „Zavladala je velika napetost”, izjavila je 35-godišnja majka Risa Kusuma tješeći svog grozničavog dječaka u evakuacijskom centru u potresom razorenom gradu Palu.

column3:
Every minute an ambulance brings in bodies.	„Hitna svake minute donosi tijela.

column3: Residents were seen returning to their destroyed homes, picking through waterlogged belongings, trying to salvage anything they could find.
column4: Stanovnici su viđeni kako se vraćaju u svoje uništene domove i prebiru po svojoj potopljenoj imovini dok pokušavaju spasiti sve što su mogli pronaći.

column3: Hundreds of people were injured and hospitals, damaged by the magnitude 7.5 quake, were overwhelmed.
column4: Stotine ljudi ozlijeđene su, a bolnice oštećene potresom jačine 7,5 stupnjeva bile su preopterećene.

column3: Some of the injured, including Dwi Haris, who suffered a broken back and shoulder, rested outside Palu's Army Hospital, where patients were being treated outdoors due to continuing strong aftershocks.
column4: Neki od ozlijeđenih, uključujući Dwija Harisa koji je slomio kralješnicu i rame, ležali su ispred vojne bolnice u gradu Palu, gdje se pacijentima liječnička skrb pružala vani zbog jakih naknadnih potresa.

column3: Tears filled his eyes as he recounted feeling the violent earthquake shake the fifth-floor hotel room he shared with his wife and daughter.
column4: Suze su mu ispunile oči dok se prisjećao trenutaka kada je razoran potres zatresao hotelsku sobu na petom katu u kojoj se nalazio sa svojom suprugom i kćerkom.

column3:
There was no time to save ourselves.	„Nije bilo vremena da se spasimo.

I heard my wife cry for help, but then silence.	„Čuo sam kako mi supruga zapomaže, ali nakon toga je zavladala tišina.

telegraph.405422	pr03	I hope they are safe.
column4: Nadam se da su na sigurnom.”

column3: Paddington publishers feared readers wouldn't relate to a talking bear, new letter reveals
column4: ﻿Novo pismo otkriva da su se izdavači Paddingtona bojali da se čitatelji neće povezati s medvjedićem koji govori

column3: Bond's daughter Karen Jankel, who was born shortly after the book was accepted, said of the letter: "It's hard to put oneself in the shoes of somebody reading it for the first time before it was published.
column4: Bondova kćer Karen Jankel, koja je rođena nedugo nakon što je knjiga prihvaćena, komentirala je pismo: „Teško je staviti se u položaj nekoga tko je prvi put čita prije nego što je objavljena.

column3: It's very amusing knowing now what we know about Paddington's huge success."
column4: Zanimljivo je to znati sada kada znamo za veliki uspjeh Paddingtona.”

column3: Saying her father, who had worked as a BBC cameraman before being inspired to write the children's book by a small toy bear, would have been sanguine about his work being rejected, she added the 60th anniversary of the books publication was "bittersweet" after his death last year.
column4: Rekla je da bi njezin otac, koji je radio kao snimatelj za BBC prije nego što ga je igračka medvjedića nadahnula da napiše dječju knjigu, bio optimističan unatoč odbijanju i dodala je da je 60. obljetnica objave knjige bila „gorko-slatka” nakon što je prošle godine preminuo.

column3: Of Paddington, whom she describes as a "very important member of our family," she added her father was quietly proud of his eventual success.
column4: Opisala je Paddingtona kao „vrlo važnog člana obitelji” i dodala je da je njezin otac bio potiho ponosan na svoj konačan uspjeh.

column3: He was quite a quiet man, and he wasn't a boastful person, she said.
column4: „Bio je vrlo tiha osoba i nije se volio hvaliti”, rekla je.

column3:
But because Paddington was so real to him, it was almost like if you have a child who achieves something: you're proud of them even though it's not your doing really.	„No zbog toga što je za njega Paddington bio tako stvaran, to je bilo gotovo kao da imate dijete koje je nešto postiglo: ponosni ste na njega iako to nije vaša zasluga.

column3: Shark injures 13-year-old on lobster dive in California
column4: ﻿Morski pas ozlijedio trinaestogodišnjaka za vrijeme lova na jastoge u Kaliforniji

column3: A shark attacked and injured a 13-year-old boy Saturday while he was diving for lobster in California on the opening day of lobster season, officials said.
column4: Morski pas napao je i ozlijedio trinaestogodišnjeg dječaka u subotu dok je ronio u potrazi za jastozima u Kaliforniji prvog dana sezone lova na jastoge, ističu nadležni.

column3: The attack occurred just before 7 a.m. near Beacon's Beach in Encinitas.
column4: Napad se dogodio nešto prije 7 ujutro u blizini plaže Beacon u Encinitasu.

column3: Chad Hammel told KSWB-TV in San Diego he had been diving with friends for about half an hour Saturday morning when he heard the boy screaming for help and then paddled over with a group to help pull him out of the water.
column4: Chad Hammel izjavio je u San Diegu za KSWB-TV da je ronio s prijateljima oko pola sata u subotnje jutro kad je začuo dječaka kako viče upomoć, nakon čega su odveslali do mjesta događaja kako bi ga pomogli izvući iz vode.

column3: Hammel said at first he thought it was just excitement of catching a lobster, but then he "realized that he was yelling, 'I got bit!
column4: Hammel je rekao da je isprva mislio da je riječ samo o uzbuđenju zbog uhvaćenog jastoga, no onda je „shvatio da dječak viče ‚Ugrizao me je!

column3: I got bit!'
column4: Ugrizao me je!’.

column3: His whole clavicle was ripped open," Hammel said he noticed once he got to the boy.
column4: Cijela ključna kost bila mu je rastrgana”, Hammel je rekao da je primijetio kad je došao do dječaka.

column3: I yelled at everyone to get out of the water: 'There's a shark in the water!' Hammel added.
column4: „Povikao sam svima da bježe iz vode: ‚Morski pas je u vodi!’”, dodao je Hammel.

column3: The boy was airlifted to Rady Children's Hospital in San Diego where he is listed in critical condition.
column4: Dječak je prevezen helikopterom u Dječju bolnicu Rady u San Diegu gdje je njegovo stanje procijenjeno kao kritično.

column3: The species of shark responsible for the attack was unknown.
column4: Vrsta morskog psa odgovornog za napad nije poznata.

column3: Lifeguard Capt. Larry Giles said at a media briefing that a shark had been spotted in the area a few weeks earlier, but it was determined not to be a dangerous species of shark.
column4: Voditelj spasilačke službe Larry Giles rekao je na novinskoj konferenciji da je na tom području nekoliko tjedana ranije primijećen morski pas, ali da je ustanovljeno da nije riječ o jednoj od opasnih vrsta.

column3: Giles added the victim sustained traumatic injuries to his upper torso area.
column4: Giles je dodao da je žrtva pretrpjela traumatske ozljede na gornjem dijelu trupa.

column3: Officials shut down beach access from Ponto Beach in Casablad to Swami's in Ecinitas for 48 hours for investigation and safety purposes.
column4: Nadležni organi zatvorili su prilaz plaži od Ponto Beacha u Casabladu to Swamija u Ecinitasu na 48 sati za potrebe istraživanja i osiguravanja područja.

column3: Giles noted that there are more than 135 shark species in the area, but most are not considered dangerous.
column4: Giles je naglasio da u tom području obitava oko 135 vrsta morskih pasa, ali većina se ne smatra opasnima.

column3: 18 states, D.C. support challenge to new asylum policy
column4: ﻿18 saveznih država i Washington podržavaju osporavanje nove politike azila

column3: Eighteen states and the District of Columbia are supporting a legal challenge to a new U.S. policy that denies asylum to victims fleeing gang or domestic violence.
column4: Osamnaest saveznih država i Washington podržavaju pravno osporavanje nove američke politike kojom se odbija azil za žrtve koje bježe od nasilja bandi ili obiteljskog nasilja.

column3: Representatives from the 18 states and the district filed a friend-of-the-court brief Friday in Washington to support an asylum-seeker challenging the policy, NBC News reported.
column4: Predstavnici 18 saveznih država i Washingtona u petak su u Washingtonu podnijeli prijateljsko izvješće kako bi podržali tražiteljicu azila koja osporava tu politiku, izvijestio je NBC News.

column3: The full name of the plaintiff in the Grace v. Sessions suit that the American Civil Liberties Union filed in August against the federal policy has not been revealed.
column4: Nije otkriveno puno ime i prezime tužiteljice u tužbi Grace protiv Sessionsa koju je Američka udruga za građanska prava u kolovozu podnijela protiv savezne politike.

column3: She said her partner "and his violent gang member sons," abused her but U.S. officials denied her request for asylum July 20.
column4: Izjavila je da su je njezin partner „i njegovi nasilni sinovi koji su članovi bande” zlostavljali, ali američki dužnosnici odbili su njezin zahtjev za azil 20. srpnja.

column3: She was detained in Texas.
column4: Pritvorena je u Texasu.

column3: The states' attorneys supporting Grace described El Salvador, Honduras and Guatemala, which produce a large number of applicants for U.S. asylum, as nations facing pervasive problems with gangs and domestic violence.
column4: Državni odvjetnici koji podržavaju Grace opisali su El Salvador, Honduras i Gvatemalu, iz kojih dolazi veliki broj tražitelja azila u SAD-u, kao države koje se suočavaju s velikim problemima povezanima s bandama i obiteljskim nasiljem.

column3: The new U.S. asylum policy reversed a 2014 decision by the Board of Immigrant Appeals that allowed undocumented immigrants fleeing domestic violence to apply for asylum.
column4: Novom američkom politikom azila poništena je odluka Odbora za žalbe useljenika iz 2014. kojom se ilegalnim useljenicima koji bježe od obiteljskog nasilja dopuštalo da zatraže azil.

column3: District of Columbia Attorney General Karl Racine said in a statement Friday that the new policy "ignores decades of state, federal, and international law."
column4: Washingtonov državni tužitelj Karl Racine u petak je izjavio da se novom politikom „zanemaruju desetljeća državnog, saveznog i međunarodnog prava”.

column3: Federal law requires that all asylum claims be adjudicated on the particular facts and circumstances of the claim, and such a bar violates that principle, the friend-of-the court brief said.
column4: „Prema saveznom pravu o svim se zahtjevima za azil mora odlučiti na temelju posebnih činjenica i okolnosti zahtjeva”, navedeno je u prijateljskom izvješću.

column3: Attorneys further argued in the brief that the policy denying immigrants entry hurts the U.S. economy, saying they are more likely to become entrepreneurs and "supply necessary labor."
column4: Odvjetnici su u izvješću obrazložili da politika kojom se sprječava ulazak useljenika loše utječe na gospodarstvo SAD-a i da useljenici češće postaju poduzetnici i „potrebna su radna snaga”.

column3: Attorney General Jeff Sessions ordered immigration judges to no longer grant asylum to victims fleeing domestic abuse and gang violence in June.
column4: Državni tužitelj Jeff Sessions u lipnju je naredio sudcima za imigraciju da više ne odobravaju azil žrtvama koje bježe od obiteljskog nasilja i nasilja bandi.

column3: Asylum is available for those who leave their home country because of persecution or fear on account of race, religion, nationality, or membership in a particular social group or political opinion, Sessions said in his June 11 announcement of the policy.
column4: „Azil je dostupan onima koji napuste svoju domovinu zbog progona ili straha povezanog s rasom, vjerom, nacionalnom pripadnošću ili pripadnošću određenoj društvenoj skupini ili političkom opredjeljenju”, izjavio je Sessions prilikom objave nove politike 11. lipnja.

column3: Asylum was never meant to alleviate all problems -- even all serious problems -- that people face every day all over the world.
column4: Svrha azila nikad nije bila rješavanje svih problema, pa čak ni svih ozbiljnih problema, s kojima se ljudi u cijelom svijetu svakodnevno suočavaju.
